definition: 1. eventually, in the end. 2. consequently, in sum, the result.

long_definition: BER--(2): 1. heave, roll, pitch, billow up. 2. be in steady movement. MENG--: 1. pitch, heave. 2. be in steady, rhythmic movement. MENG--KAN: put s.t. in steady motion. --AN: 1. wave (in air). 2. strains (music)

definition: 1. deed, work. 2. good deed, charity. Also MENG--BAKTIKAN, BER-, MENG--KAN, +
long_definition: 1. deed, work. 2. good deed, charity. MENG--BAKTIKAN: put to charitable use. BER-: 1. be charitable, generous. 2. pray silently. MENG--KAN: 1. put into practice, apply. 2. do s.t. regularly. 3. carry out with devotion. -AN: good deeds, good works, regular practice. PENG--AN: doing of good deeds, sincerity in doing s.t.
example: Tindakannya merupakan AMALAN yang benar.

long_definition: ^*1 peaceful, calm. 2 safe, secure. *MENG--KAN: 1 pacify, render safe. 2 place in protective custody, hold in custody. *KE--AN: 1 safety, security. 2 peacefulness, tranquillity. PENG-: 1 safe-guard. 2 pacifier, peacemaker, conciliator. PENG--AN: 1 (Mil.) pacification. 2 efforts to achieve security.
vernacular_definition: 1. Tidak ada bahaya. 2. Tidak merasa takut; tenteram; sentosa.

long_definition: BER--: instruct, issue an order. MENG--I: deliver a speech, give advice. MENG--KAN: 1. entrust, commit. 2. instruct, order. 3. delicate, set aside.
example: see amanat

long_definition: BER--: instruct, issue an order. MENG--I: deliver a speech, give advice. MENG--KAN: 1. entrust, commit. 2. instruct, order. 3. delicate, set aside.
example: see amanah

long_definition: see AMAT1 (very, exceedingly . . .) AMAT2 (watch closely . . .).
*very, exceedingly.
example: who was VERY heroic and brave.

example: PENGAMATANNYA sangat cermat.

*MENG-- : float *KURS -- : [Fin.] floating rate

long_definition: 1. kurs ~ (Fin): floating rate. MENG--KAN: float s.t. PENG--AN: floating (of currency)

example: Ahmad's left foot was AMPUTATED three years ago.

example: AMUKAN kerbau yang sedang terluka sangat berbahaya.

long_definition: ^white ant, termite
example: Sehabis panen, banyak ANAI-ANAI memakan bulir padi yang tertinggal

definition: a child, offspring, or descendent; a small version of. Also MEMPER--KAN,+
long_definition: a child or offspring or descendant; a small version of. ^MEMPER--KAN: 1 bear, bive birth to. 2 treat as o.'s own child. MEMPER-_-_-KAN: treat like a little child. KE-_-_-AN: childish, child-like. _-_-AN: doll. PER--AN: 1 of mixed ethnic origins (Eurasian or Chinese with some Indonesian ancestry). 2 uterus, womb. 3 hybrid (of cattle). *--BUAH: dependents, sub, smaller variant of, crew, staff members, loyal subjects, followers.
vernacular_definition: 1.Orang yang masih kecil. 2.Orang yang belum dewasa. 3.Orang yang berumur sekitar 0-10 tahun. 4.Anak keturunan orang tua.

you, your.

long_definition: ^if -PUN: supposing that. _-_: suppostition. *SE-(NYA), -NYA: supposing or suppose that. BER-: suppose. *BER_-_: suppose that s.t. might happen, talk hypothetically. *-KAN: assuming MENG--KAN: suppose, assume. *PENG--AN: suppostion, assumption. PER--AN: assumption.

example: Negara-negara OPEC MENGANDALKAN pendapatannya dari minyak bumi

example: *Dia mempunyai ANDIL yang besar dalam menyelesaikan perselisihan itu

long_definition: four-wheeled carriage drawn by two horses common in central Java.

example: kami naik ANDONG ke pasar.

definition: strange, queer, peculiar. -NYA: the strange thing is. Also MENG--KAN, KE--AN,+
long_definition: ^*strange, queer, peculiar. *-NYA: the strange thing is. *MENG--KAN: 1 make o. consider s.t. strange. 2 be surprising. *KE--AN: 1 oddity, peculiarity. 2 idiosyncrasy. _-_-AN: 1 oddity.
example: Mengapa kau mau MENGANEHKAN kataku ini?

definition: various, diverse, all sorts of. Also KE--RAGAMAN, BER-, KE--WARNAAN, MENG--KAN+
long_definition: ^various, diverse, all sorts of. KE--RAGAMAN: variety, diversity. BER-: variegated, mixed. KE--WARNAAN: variety. MENG--KAN: vary, make diverse. KE--AN: variety.
example: Dengan MENGANEKAKAN warna amplop itu kita bisa membedakan isinya.

definition: 1. thought, notion, idea. 2. fantasy, illusion. BER-: fantasize, dream. +
long_definition: ^1. thought, notion, idea. 2. fantasy, illusion. BER-: 1. dream, fantasize. 2. aim, have ideals. MENG-(-KAN): 1. recall, contemplate. 2. imagine. TER-: thought, intended. -AN: idea, notion.
example: Ini hanya ANGANAN sepintas saja.

definition: BER--AN: be of the opinion; have an impression. Also MENG-, -AN.
long_definition: ^*BER--AN: 1 be of the opinion. 2 have an impression *MENG-: regard as, consider, deem. *-AN: 1 opinion, belief. 2 judgment. 3 suspicion, hunch, impression.
example: Menurut ANGGAPAN umum, hal itu tidak benar.

definition: MENG-: estimate, calculate. MENG--KAN: draw up a budget. -AN: estimate. +
long_definition: MENG-: estimate, calculate. MENG--KAN: draw up a budget. -AN: estimate, budget. PENG--AN: budgeting.
example: Pemerintah sudah MENGANGGARKAN lebih dari tiga milyar rupiah untuk pembangunan jalan ini.

definition: member (of an organization); body part, limb; part, component. Also BER-,+
long_definition: ^*1 member (of an organization). 2 body part, limb. 3 part, component. BER-: have as member. *BER--KAN: be composed of, have as members. *KE--AN: membership.
vernacular_definition: 1. Bagian dari tubuh (biasanya tangan dan kaki). 2. Orang yang masuk dalam satu golongan/organisasi.
example: KEANGGOTAAN Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat sangat terbatas.

long_definition: orchid.

definition: a nod. MENG-: to nod. MENGANGGUK-ANGGUKKAN=to no several times.
long_definition: a nod. MENG-: to nod. MENGANGGUK-ANGGUKKAN = to nod several times.
vernacular_definition: Menggerakkan kepala ke depan; tanda persetujuan.
example: Kepalanya MENGANGGUK walau hatinya bilang tidak.

long_definition: *KE--AN: elegance
example: Maria kelihatan sangat ANGGUN dengan baju kebayanya

definition: be unemployed, idle; cutting from a plant; grape, wine. Also (ME)NG-, PENG-,+
long_definition: ^ANGGUR1=to be unemployed, idle. (see also NGANGGUR) *(ME)NG-: (same as NGANGGUR). NGANGGUR: to be temporarily unoccupied. *PENG-: unemployed person. *PENG--AN: unemployment, joblessness. ^ANGGUR2=slip, cutting of plants. MENG-: 1 prepare cutting of planting. 2 transplant, plant with a slip. ^*ANGGUR3=1 grape. 2 wine.
vernacular_definition: 1. Tidak melakukan ada-apa. 2a. Minuman yang dibuat dari buah anggur. b. Tumbuhan/tanaman; buah.
example: Buah ANGGUR yang dikeringkan disebut kismis.

definition: wind; air; rumor. BER-: windy; have wind circulating. Also BER-_-_, MENG-,+
long_definition: ^*1 wind. 2 air. 3 rumor. *BER-: 1 windy. 2 have wind circulating. BER-_-_: get some fresh air. MENG-: 1 become wind, disappear. 2 blow (of wind). *MENG--I: to supply with air. *MENG-_-_-KAN: 1 air, aerate, expose to the air. MEMPER--KAN: air, aerate. TER-: perceptible, noticeable. TER-_-_: spread (of news, rumors, etc.). *_-_-AN: blow hot and cold, fickle, be capricious. PENG-_-_-AN: aeration, airing. PER--AN: 1 ventilation. 2 balcony.
example: Pendapatmu selalu ANGIN-ANGINAN, tidak pernah pasti.

definition: figure, numeral; rate; mark, grade. Also ANGKA-ANGKA, MENG--KAN,+
long_definition: ^*1 figure, numeral, digit. 2 rate. 3 mark, grade. ANGKA-ANGKA: 1 number. 2 statistics, figures. MENG--KAN: 1 mark, grade (exams, etc.). 2 mark, number. MEMPER--KAN: treat as numbers. PENG--AN: numbering. PER--AN: statistics.
example: Berapa ANGKA yang kau dapat dalam matematika?

definition: sky, heaven, atmosphere, outer space. Also MENG-, MENG--KAN.
long_definition: ^1. sky, heaven. 2. atmosphere, outer space. MENG-: 1. be airborne, take off. 2. come to the fore. MENG--KAN: develop to the fullest.
vernacular_definition: Langit; awang-awang; lapisan udara di atas bumi; dll.
example: Pesawat percobaan itu akan MENGANGKASA bulan depan.

definition: lift, raise; take away; begin to do s.t. BER-: depart. Also BER--NYA, +
long_definition: ^*1 lift, raise. 2 take away, remove. 3 begin to do s.t. *BER-: leave, depart, set out. BER--NYA: departure, leaving. *MEMBER--KAN: dispatch, send. *KEBER--AN: departure. PEMBER--AN: sending off, dispatch. *MENG-: 1 lift (up), raise. 2appoint, designate. 3 promote. 4 remove, take away. 5 take up. 6 adopt (a child), adapt (written material). 7 nab, pick up. MENG-_-_: praise. MENG--I: remove (many things). MENG--KAN: 1 lift up, raise. 2 roll up (o.'s sleeves). 3 dispatched. TER-: 1 able to be picked up. 2 unintentionally lifted up. *-AN: 1 branch of armed forces. 2 generation, age group, class. PENG-: 1 support. 2 instrument for lifting. 3 lifter, o. who lifts. PENG--AN: 1 appointment. 2 adoption (of child). 3 elevation. PER-: sets of equipment. SEPER-(-AN): a set of s.t.
example: Banyak pegawai ANGKATAN tahun 1945 yang sudah pensiun.

long_definition: 1. eerie (esp. of haunted places); 2. [Coll.] terrible
example: Rumah ini sangat ANGKER dan tidak ada orang yang ingin tinggal di sini lagi

long_definition: 1. inquiry poll; 2. questionnaire
example: Hasil penelitian ini berdasarkan pengumpulan ANGKET seluruh Indonesia

long_definition: women's waistband.
vernacular_definition: Ikat pinggang untuk wanita yang terbuat dari kain.
example: ANGKIN ini kepunyaan nenekku.

long_definition: bamboo musical instrument.
vernacular_definition: Alat musik yang terbuat dari bambu.

long_definition: arrogant.

definition: MENG-: 1. carry, transport. 2. carry away. 3. contain. Also MENG--I, -AN, PENG-+
long_definition: ^MENG-: 1. carry, transport. 2. carry away. 3. contain. MENG--I: pick up, collect. -AN: 1. transport. 2. shipment. PENG-: transporter, carrier. PENG--AN: transportation.
example: Gunakan bakul ini sebagai alat PENGANGKUT.

long_definition: goose.

definition: BER-_-_: little by little; move forward a little. Also MENG-, MENG--I,+
long_definition: ^*BER-_-_: 1 little by little. 2 move forward a little. 3 in installments. *MENG-: 1 do gradually. 2 pay in installments. 3 move. MENG--I: pay for s.t. in installments. MENG--KAN: 1order s.o. to move. 2 pay s.t. in installments. 3 move forward. *-AN: installment payment. PENG--AN: 1 process of paying installments. 2 process of moving gradually.
example: 2000,- per bulan.

definition: small knife used for harvesting rice.
long_definition: small knife used for harvesting rice.
vernacular_definition: Alat untuk memotong padi, biasanya berbentuk pisau kecil yang melengkung.

long_definition: ill treatment, tyranny, oppression, injustice * MENG~ = oppress, torture, beat MENG~I = 1. maltreat, torture, beat, viciously, 2. tyrannize, persecute TER~ = molested, mistreated PENG~ = tyrant, maltreater ** PENG~AN = 1. mistreatment, cruel treatment, molestation 2. oppression, tyrannical treatment, 3. battering
example: ** Terdapat beberapa bukti bahwa tentara melalukan PENGANIAYAAN terhadap penduduk Timor Timur

long_definition: *BER- : move, get up
example: Ayah BERANJAK tua san kekuatannya berkurang

example: ANJING itu berlari-lari di halaman rumah

example: Harga bahan bakar minyak ANJLOG setelah peristiwa itu

definition: anjur1 = BER-, MENG-: withdraw. anjur2 = MENG-: 1. stick out. 2. move on. +
long_definition: ^ANJUR1 = BER-, MENG-: withdraw. ANJUR2 = MENG-: 1. stick out, protrude. 2. move on or toward. MENG--I: 1. lead (a parade). 2. pioneer, take the initiative. MENG--KAN: 1. recommend, propose. 2. extend or project s.t. -AN: proposal, recommendation, advice, suggestion. PENG-: 1. proponent, advocate. 2. promoter.
vernacular_definition: Memberikan/mengemukakan sesuatu supaya dituruti, mengunjukkan; memberi nasehat supaya seseorang melakukan sesuatu.
example: ANJURAN bapak Bupati agar semua petani menanam tebu tidak dituruti.

long_definition: dwarf buffalo
solid, sound.

definition: 1 accompany. 2 inter- (used in compounds). Also MENG-, MENG-(-KAN),+
long_definition: ^ANTAR1=accompany. _-MENG-_: 1 send to e.o. 2 deliver (packages, letters, etc.). MENG-: 1 deliver, bring s.t. 2 carry, transmit. MENG--I: bring or send to s.o. *MENG-(-KAN): 1 accompany, bring s.o. to a destination. 2 see off. 3 introduce. -AN: 1 (Elec.) conductor. 2 an order, thing ordered.. 3 s.t. delivered. *PENG-: 1 companion, escort. 2 o. who delivers. 3 porter. 4 bellboy. 5 (Elec.) conductory. 6 introduction. ^*ANTAR2=inter- (used in compounds).
example: Saya senang melihat seragam PENGANTAR POS itu.

definition: between; in, about (of time); in the meanwhile. Also -NYA, SE-,+
long_definition: ^*1 between. 2 in, about (of time). 3 in the meanwhile. *-NYA: 1 among (them), between. 2 distance, gap. SE-: all around, entirely. BER-_-_: 1 at intervals. 2 be at a distance. 3 have an intermediary. MENG--I: 1 come or be between. 2 intercede, mediate. *PER-, PENG-: 1 intermediary, mediator, go-between. 2 agent. 3 agency, expediter. PENG--AN: intercession, mediation. PER--AN: 1 intercession, mediation. 2 middleman, intermediary (individual or a body). 3 intervention. 4 relationship.
vernacular_definition: 1. Selang. 2. Ditengah dua benda; jarak. 3. Kira-kira.
example: Seorang PERANTARA sangat penting artinya dalam upacara perkawinan di Indonesia.

long_definition: international.

long_definition: female astronaut.
vernacular_definition: Astronaut wanita; awak pesawat antariksa wanita.

long_definition: astronaut.

definition: what, which; a question marker; or; "eh". APA-APA: anything. Also -NYA+

BER-: 1 do what. 2 see BERAPA. *MENG-: 1 why. 2 do what. MENG--KAN: do what to. NG--IN: (Jkt.) 1 do what. 2 why. MENG-_-_-KAN: do s.t. (harmful).

long_definition: when.

NG-: (Jkt, Sd) understand, comprehend. *MENG--KAN: 1 interpret, construe. 2 bear a meaning for, lead o. to understand. -AN: 1 meaning. 2 idea, concept. 3 interpretation. *PENG--AN: 1 understanding. 2 meaning, sense.

SE-: related. -NYA: originally, initially. *BER-: 1 come from. 2 be descended from. *--USUL: origins, source. ^*ASAL2=1 provided that, as long as. 2 do s.t. for no good reason other than just to do it. 3 just be able to do the most important thing. SE--NYA: haphazardly, only well enough to get by. -KAN: provided that.

long_definition: * MEM--: rebel, resist, oppose * MEM--I: rebel against, resist s.t. * PEM--: 1. rebel, resister, dissident 2. intractable person, insubordinate person * PEM--AN: 1. insubordination, disobedience, rebelliousness. 2. protest
example: Ia sengaja MEMBANGKANGI ajaran-ajaran agama

long_definition: 1. tough and stiff, coarse. 2. rigid.

definition: get up, arise from a reclining position. Also MEM-, MEM--KAN, KE--AN.
long_definition: get up, arise from a reclining position. MEM-: 1 cause to arise. 2 encourage. 3 to arise. MEM--KAN: rise, arouse, provoke. KE--AN: awakening, arousal.
example: Paskah merayakan hari KEBANGKITAN Yesus dari kuburnya.

long_definition: bankrupt.
vernacular_definition: Usaha yang rugi; tidak beruntung; jatuh miskin.
example: Semenjak ayahnya meninggal semua usahanya mulai BANGKRUT.

long_definition: bench, seat.
example: Temanku SEBANGKU dulu sekarang sudah menjadi dokter.

definition: nation, people, race. KE--AN: nationality; nationalism. Also BERKE--AN.
long_definition: ^*nation, people, race. KE--AN: 1 nationality. 2 nationalism, nationalist. 3 national. BERKE--AN: have the nationality of . . .
vernacular_definition: Kesatuan orang-orang dalam satu pemerintahan di suatu tempat tertentu.
example: Amir's wife has the NATIONALITY of Mexico.
Kayunya adalah BANGSAI

long_definition: 1. -- lokomotip: roundhouse 2. -- pengeringan: drying shed 3. public building 4. -- pertemuan : meeting hall -- olah raga: gymnasium 5. market stalls 6. ward 7. emergency housing, lean-to

definition: rascal, scoundrel; a miserably poor person.
long_definition: ^1 rascal, scoundrel. 2 a miserably poor person.
vernacular_definition: Kutu busuk/kepinding; orang yang bertabiat buruk.
example: =How can that SCOUNDREL be believed when all he does is ruin other people!

definition: a person of the nobility or aristocracy.
long_definition: a person of the nobility or aristocracy.
vernacular_definition: Orang yang masih keturunan raja (berdarah biru).
example: "Raden" adalah titel BANGSAWAN untuk keluarga kerajaan di Jawa.

definition: wake up; get up. BER-: get up. MEM-: build, construct. Also MEM--KAN, +
long_definition: ^*1 wake up. 2 get up. BER-: get up. *MEM-: build, construct. *MEM--KAN: 1 wake s.o. up. 2 build, erect. *TER-: awaken (suddenly). *-AN: 1 building, structure. 2 construction. *PEM--AN: 1 (re)construction. 2 development.
vernacular_definition: Berdiri dari duduk, tidur, pingsan, dll.
example: PEMBANGUNAN jalan kereta api akan diteruskan sampai tahun depan.

long_definition: 1. series, -- pulau: series of islands. 2. train of events * SE--: of the same row, line, series. * BER-(2), BER-AN: form a line, line up. * MEM-KAN: line up, arrange in rows * --AN: line, row, file
example: Murid-murid BERBANJARAN menurut kelas masing-masing

definition: capital city of the Province of Southern Kalimantan in Indonesia.
long_definition: capital city of the Province of Southern Kalimantan in Indonesia, located on the Island of Kalimantan.

definition: flood, deluge. MEM-: in floods. MEM--I: flood, overwhelm. Also KE--AN, PEM--AN.
long_definition: ^flood, deluge. MEM-: in floods, in a large quantity. MEM--I: flood, overwhelm. KE--AN: flooded, overwhelmed. PEM--AN: flooding.
vernacular_definition: Banyak sekali; air sungai yang meluap karena hujan.
example: Saya KEBANJIRAN hadiah waktu memenangkan lomba lari.

long_definition: sticker

definition: to say s.t. by way of disagreement. Also BER-, MEM-, MEM--I, MEM--KAN.
long_definition: to say s.t. by way of disagreement. BER-: to disagree or dispute. MEM-: to take opposition. MEM--I: to refute, argue against. MEM--KAN: to dispute s.t. -AN: protest.
example: BANTAHAN resmi mengenai kasus itu akan dikeluarkan oleh pemerintah.

long_definition: slaughter.
example: Dia BANTAI orang-orang yang dianggapnya musuhnya.

definition: pillow, cushion. BER-: sleep with s.o.; use as a pillow. -AN: bolster, cushion.
long_definition: ^pillow, cushion. BER-: 1 sleep with s.o. or share s.o.'s bed. 2 use as a pillow. -AN: bolster, cushion, pillow.
vernacular_definition: Karung yang biasanya berisi kapas untuk alas duduk atau tidur.
example: Kakek selalu duduk di atas BANTALAN kursi.

long_definition: wild bull
fast, quick, rapid.
example: BANTER juga larinya sepeda motormu.

long_definition: throw down forcefully.

definition: assist. MEM-: help, aid, assist. -AN: aid, help, assistance. Also PEM-, +
long_definition: ^*assist. *MEM-: 1 help, aid, assist. 2 support, back up. *-AN: aid, help, assistance. *PEM-: 1 helper, assistant. 2 domestic servant. PEM--AN: provision of assistance.
example: Apa jadinya kalau tidak ada PEMBANTUku ini.

definition: many, much. -NYA: amount, quantity; number. Also SE-, SE-_-_-NYA, +
long_definition: ^*many, much. -NYA: 1 amount, quantity. 2 number. *SE-: as many as, as much as, amounting to. *SE-_-_-NYA: as much or many as possible. TER-: the greatest number. KE--AN: majority, the greater part.
example: KEBANYAKAN penduduk kampung itu adalah keturunan Arab.

long_definition: 1. joke, jest, gag; 2. clown, jokester MEM-- : tell jokes ---AN: joke [Col.] NGE-- : clown around
vernacular_definition: gurauan; bercanda; melawak; melucu; berbuat sesuatu yang lucu

definition: father; form of address for older man; part of respectful title. Also KE--AN, +
long_definition: ^*1 father. 2 form of address to an older man, esp. as "pak". 3 part of a respectful title for an older man, esp. as "pak". *KE--AN: fatherly, paternal. PER--AN: fatherhood.
vernacular_definition: !. Orang tua laki-laki/ayah. 2. Sebutan untuk orang laki-laki yang lebih tua. 3. Sebutan penghormatan bagi sesorang.
example: Walaupun umurnya masih sangat muda, tetapi sifatnya sangat KEBAPAKAN.

long_definition: (Badan Perencanaan Daerah) Agency for Regional Development.
(Badan Perencanaan Pembangunan Nasional) National Development Planning Board.

definition: 1. (Rel) baptism 2. the Baptist sect or adherent thereof
long_definition: MEM--(KAN): 1. baptize 2. convert (to Christianity) --AN: baptism PEM--: baptism * PEM--AN: baptizing 2. christening
example: Seolah-olah aku DIBAPTISKAN masuk ke dunia baru

long_definition: 1. -- api: ember, -- halus: coal dust 2. heat, warmth 3. fire, fervor *MEM--: 1. be aglow, smoulder 2. blaze, burn *MEM--KAN: 1. set ablaze 2. illuminate 3. inflame. excite *PEM--AN: the burning of s.t. *PER--AN: brazier, hearth, furnace. *BATU--: coal.
*MEM--: quarantine, segregate
example: Karena penyakit yang menular itu ia di BARAK

long_definition: *KE--AN: bliss, blessedness
see BARANG1 (goods, commodities, object.....) BARANG2 (any.....) BARANG3 (more or less, approximately.....)

definition: goods, commodities; article, object; baggage, luggage. Also BARANG-BARANG.
long_definition: ^*1 goods, commodities. 2 article, object. 3 baggage, luggage. *BARANG-BARANG: 1 belongings. 2 goods, commodities.
example: Setiba di bandara kami langsung ke tempat pengambilan BARANG.

definition: any. SEM-(-AN): any old, just any.
long_definition: ^any. *SEM-: any old, just any. *SEM-AN: to do in an offhand manner.
example: Don't speak OFFHANDEDLY.

long_definition: ^*more or less, approximately.
example: Berilah saya kesempatan BARANG SEKALI saja.

long_definition: *maybe, perhaps.
example: BARANGKALI keberangkatan pesawat terbang ini akan ditunda.

definition: west, western. MEM-: to go westward. PEM--AN: Westernization.
long_definition: *west, western. *MEM-: to go westward. *PEM--AN: Westernization. *BARAT DAYA: south-west *BARAT LAUT: north-west.
vernacular_definition: Salah satu petunjuk arah disamping utara, timur, dan selatan.
example: Pada jaman penjajahan, Belanda berusaha melakukan PEMBARATAN dalam segala hal.

long_definition: (Jv.) with. MEM--I: accompany.
example: Ulang tahunnya BARENG dengan ulang tahunku.

definition: baret1: beret, baret2: laceration, scratch, abration
long_definition: baret1: beret baret2: 1. laceration, scratch, abration 2. lacerated, scratched * TER~ = scratched
vernacular_definition: baret merah = nick name for army commandos
example: * Jari tangan saya TERBARET

definition: 1. grain (in wood) 2. vein (in marble) 3. spotted (of eggshell)
long_definition: BER--: veined, grained

definition: BER-: to lie down. TER-: lying. BERBARING-BARING=resting, lying down.
long_definition: BER-: to lie down. TER-: lying. BERBARING-BARING = resting, lying down.

definition: line, row. BER-: to be in a line or row. MEM--KAN: arrange in rows. Also -AN.
long_definition: line, row. BER-: to be in a line or row. MEM--KAN: arrange in rows. -AN: the ranks, the front.
example: Ini adalah BARISAN kuburan bekas tentara perang.

long_definition: abbreviation of a new political party formed in 1998 by Kemal Idris, a retired army.
example: Ketua BARISAN NASIONAL (BARNAS) Letnan General (Purn) Kemal Idris menolak tuduhan pemerintah tentang usaha makar

long_definition: kind of dance with mask (Bali)

definition: new, recent; modern; only so much up to now; only now; not until. Also TER-, +
long_definition: ^*1 new, recent. 2 modern. 3 just, only so much up to now. 4 only now, just at a certain time. 5 not until, only then. *MEM(PER)--I: modernize, renovate, remodel. *TER-: newest. *PEM--AN: modernization, renovation, remodeling.
vernacular_definition: Sesuatu yang belum pernah ada sebelumnya.
example: Untuk mengejar ketinggalan dalam bidang teknologi, kita harus banyak melakukan PEMBARUAN.
BARUSAN saja suami saya berangkat

long_definition: *MEM--: 1. dress, bandage (a wound, etc.) 2. swathe, bind up ( a baby) * PEM--: bandage, dressing *PEM--AN: bandaging, dressing (of wounds)
MEM--: 1. scrub, clean, polish wipe (floors etc.) 2. grease

definition: (Isl) the place and time between death and the Last Judgement.
long_definition: (Isl) the place and time between death and the Last Judgement.
1. conventional phrase of greeting etc., conventionality *BER--: be courteous
example: Jumpailah beliau sekedar BASA-BASI, siapa tahu ada gunanya

definition: wet, soaked; fresh (not dried). MEM-: become moist. Also MEM--I, PEM--AN.
long_definition: ^*1 wet, soaked. 2 fresh (not dried). MEM-: become moist. *MEM--I: dampen, moisten. *KE--AN: 1 wetness, dampness. 2 to become soaked with water. PEM--AN: moistening, dampening.

example: Semua bukuku KEBASAHAN air hujan karena atap rumahku bocor.

long_definition: 1. spoiled, stale. 2. out-of-date, not topical
example: Ceritamu sudah BASI

long_definition: *MEM--KAN: let spoil, let go to waste
example: Nasinya sudah BASI

long_definition: basis, principle (Mil.) base BER-- : have a base BER--KAN: to have a base(principle)
example: Contoh yang dia katakan tidak BERBASISKAN pada fakta

long_definition: washbasin
example: Tolong taruh potongan sayur itu di BASKOM

definition: washing. MEM-: wash (hands, clothes, dishes). Also PEM-, PEM--AN.
long_definition: ^*washing. *MEM-: wash (hands, clothes, dishes). *PEM-: 1 cleansing material. 2 washer. PEM--AN: washing.
example: Buah apel itu harus DIBASUH dulu sebelum kau makan.

definition: Batak = a people of N. Sumatra. batak = vagabond, adventurer. SEE MEM-, PEM.
long_definition: ^1. Batak = people of N. Sumatra. 2. batak = vagabond, adventurer. MEM-: rob, plunder; wander, roam. PEM-: robber, plunderer; adventurer.
vernacular_definition: Nama suku di daerah Sumatera Utara; pengembara/petualang.
example: Di selat itu terkenal banyak PEMBATAKNYA.

long_definition: concrete brick.
vernacular_definition: Balok persegi empat yang terbuat dari campuran pasir dan semen dipakai untuk membuat tembok.

definition: cancelled, null, void. MEM--KAN: cancel, revoke, rescind. KE--AN: nullification.
long_definition: ^*cancelled, null, void. *MEM--KAN: cancel. revoke, rescind. KE--AN: nullification. *PEM--AN: 1 cancellation. 2 annulment, renunciation.
example: PEMBATALAN keberangkatan kereta api ini mengganggu jadwal kerjaku.

long_definition: see batalyon
(Ml) battalion
example: Bambang Kristiono adalah bekas Komandan BATALYON 42 Group IV Kopassus

definition: stem; stick, pole; trunk (of tree); classifier for long objects. Also BER-, +
long_definition: ^*1 stem, stalk. 2 stick, pole, shaft. 3 trunk (of tree). 4 classifier for oblong, cylindrical objects. 5 a dead body. *BER-: have a certain k.o. stem. MEM-: erect, become stiff. -AN: 1 barrier. 2 crossbeam. 3 bar.
vernacular_definition: +Bagian pohon tempat tumbuhnya cabang dan daun. +Benda yang bentuknya bulat panjang. +Bangkai/mayat.
example: Ia telah menjadi BATANG.

definition: limit; border. BER--AN: border on, be adjacent to. Also MEM--I, -AN, +
long_definition: ^*1 limit. 2 border. *BER--AN: border on, be adjacent to. *MEM--I: limit, restrict. *-AN: 1 border, boundary. 2 limitation, restriction. *PEM--AN: restriction. *PER--AN: border, division.
vernacular_definition: Garis atau sesuatu yang memisahkan satu dan lain hal. Ketentuan yang tak boleh dilanggar. Hal yang digunakan sebagai perkiraan.
example: Daerah PERBATASAN antara Mexico dan Amerika dijaga sangat ketat.

long_definition: 1. dry-cell battery; 2.[Mil.] battery
example: Saya akan mengganti BATERAI senter ini dengan yang baru

long_definition: *cotton cloth colored (traditionally) by means of a wax-dye method to form intricate patterns. *MEM-: do batik work. **** {See MEMBATIK entry for picture} **** *PEM-: s.o. who makes batik.
vernacular_definition: Kain yang dibuat dengan metode dan pola khusus yang terkenal dilakukan oleh orang Jawa.
example: Untuk MEMBATIK sehelai kain selebar satu meter dibutuhkan waktu selama satu minggu.

definition: inner, spiritual, mind, heart. Also BER-, MEM-, MEM--KAN, KE--AN, PEM--AN.
long_definition: ^1. inner, spiritual. 2. mind, heart. BER-: mull over. MEM-: say to o.s. MEM--KAN: keep to o.s., keep secret. KE--AN: mysticism, spiritualism, spirit. PEM--AN: inner meditations.
vernacular_definition: Perasaan; sesuatu rasa yang terdapat di dalam hati; suara jiwa; dll.
example: Orang itu mengajar ilmu KEBATINAN.

long_definition: *-Kepala = skull
example: BATOK KEPALA nya sakit karena terkena batu

definition: stone. MEM-: fossilize; petrify; harden. Also PEM--AN, PE(R)--AN.
long_definition: ^stone. *BER-: to be rocky. *MEM-: 1 fossilize, petrify. 2 harden. *PEM--AN: fossilization. PE(R)--AN: a rocky place. *--BARA: charcoal.
vernacular_definition: +Benda padat yang keras bukan terbuat dari logam.
example: Tempat itu kurang subur karena merupakan daerah BERBATU.

long_definition: see BARA
cough, to cough.
vernacular_definition: Jenis penyakit yang membuat orang mengeluarkan suara karena rasa gatal di tenggorokan.
example: Sudah hampir dua minggu BATUK ini menggangguku.

definition: scent, aroma, odor; stench. BER-: give off an odor. Also MEM-, MEM--I.
long_definition: ^*1 scent, smell, aroma, odor. 2 unpleasant odor, stench, stink. *BER-: give off an odor. *MEM-: smell a rat, suspect s.t. is wrong. *MEM--I: 1 smell s.t. 2. to give a smell to s.t.
vernacular_definition: Sesuatu yang bisa ditangkap oleh indera penciuman.
example: Dia sedang MEMBAUI telur itu dengan BAU yang khas.

long_definition: BER- (-an): 1. be mixed 2. socialize 3. live together MEM-: 1. diffuse 2. assimilate MEM- -I: mix into MEM- -KAN: mix something
example: Saya suka BERBAUR dengan tetangga.

definition: bring, bring along. MEM-: carry; bring, take along. Also MEM--KAN, TER-.
long_definition: ^*bring, bring along. *MEM-: 1 carry. 2 bring, take along. *MEM--KAN: bring s.t. for s.o. *TER-: taken along(accidentally).
vernacular_definition: Mengangkat sesuatu dari satu tempat ke tempat yang lain.
example: Jangan terlalu pelit karena harta tidak akan DIBAWA mati.

definition: under, beneath. MEM--I: be under or beneath; supervise. Also MEM--KAN, -AN.
long_definition: ^*under, beneath. *MEM--I: 1 be under or beneath. 2 supervise, have under. *MEM--KAN: be in charge of, supervise. *-AN: subordinate, underling.
example: Seluruh BAWAHANnya sangat menghormatinya.

long_definition: *onion. (The picture shows both BAWANG MERAH [=red onions or shallots] and BAWANG PUTIH [=garlic]).
vernacular_definition: Tanaman umbi lapis, biasa digunakan sebagai bumbu dalam masakan.=
example: "BAWANG MERAH dan BAWANG PUTIH" (nama tokoh dalam cerita) adalah judul cerita anak-anak tentang hal yang baik dan buruk

long_definition: [Coll.] fault finding, carping.

definition: old. SE-: of the same age.
long_definition: old. SE-: of the same age.
example: Kedua anak itu umurnya SEBAYA.

long_definition: spinach
example: Sayur BAYAM mengandung vitamin A

definition: shadow; image. MEM--KAN: reflect an image; imagine. Also TER-, -AN.
long_definition: ^1 shadow. 2 image. MEM--KAN: 1 reflect an image. 2 imagine, call to mind. TER-: be visible or imagined. -AN: 1 shadow. 2 imagination. 3 apparition.
vernacular_definition: Wujud hitam dari benda yang kena cahaya.
example: BAYANGAN orang tuanya yang sengsara di kampung yang membuatnya tabah menderita.

definition: MEM-: pay; pay for. -AN: payment. PEM-: payer. PEM--AN: payment.
long_definition: ^*MEM-: 1 pay. 2 pay for. -AN: payment. PEM-: payer. *PEM--AN: payment.
vernacular_definition: Memberikan uang/cek untuk mendapatkan barang. Memenuhi janji/ hutang dll.
example: PEMBAYARAN rumah ini saya lakukan secara berangsur-angsur.

long_definition: *baby.
vernacular_definition: Anak kecil yang baru saja lahir.
example: Walaupun umurnya sudah tiga tahun,

long_definition: 1. wind, breeze; 2. fermented, stale *--AN: leftovers, stale foods
example: Di sore hari, BAYU bertiup lembut

long_definition: = bahan bakar minyak = fuel oil LIT: bahan = material, stuff (as in bahan makan = food stuff), bakar = burn (so bahan bakar = fuel), minyak = oil
example: Ada banyak demo di Jakarta yang memprotes karena harga BBM naik.

long_definition: (Bea Cukai) Bureau of Customs.

definition: excise, tax, duty, toll; cost, expense. MEM-: to levy a tax.
long_definition: ^1 excise, tax, duty, toll. 2 cost, expense. MEM-: to levy a tax. *BEA-CUKAI: customs.
example: Jangan berlabuh di pantai itu! Engkau akan dikenai BEA MASUK.

long_definition: scholarship.
vernacular_definition: Uang/biaya sebagai bantuan untuk belajar bagi siswa/mahasiswa.
example: Saya tidak bisa meneruskan belajar karena tidak ada BEASISWA.

long_definition: 1. stupid; 2. silly, foolish
example: Jika engkau tidak rajin sekolah, engkau akan menjadi anak yang BEBAL

definition: burden, load. MEM--KAN: to load s.t. on to s.t. else, to impose a burden on.
long_definition: burden, load. MEM--KAN: to load s.t. on to s.t. else, to impose a burden on s.t. or s.o.
example: Jangan MEMBEBANKAN kewajiban yang berat ini pada anakmu.

definition: free, unhindered. MEM--KAN: release from bondage, set free. Also KE--AN, +
long_definition: free, unhindered. MEM--KAN: to release from bondage, set free. KE--AN: freedom. PEM-: liberator. PEM--AN: liberation.
example: Dialah tokoh dibalik PEMBEBASAN tanah rakyat itu.

long_definition: bondage, dressing. *MEM--I: bandage, dress (a wound). *MEM--KAN: use s.t. to bandage (a wound). *--AN: bandage, dressing. *PEM--: bandager, dresser. *PEM--AN: bandaging, dressing (of a wound).
example: Supaya BEBATAN ini tetap rapi, kamu sebaiknya jangan banyak bergerak

long_definition: duck.
example: Banyak BEBEK yang berkeliaran di danau itu.

long_definition: see BERAPA.
see BINGKA.
senile *MUSUH--: long-time enemies
example: Amerika dan Uni Soviet pernah menjadi musuh BEBUYUTAN selama periode perang dingin

definition: pedicab, tricycle. BER-: ride a pedicab. BER-_-_-AN: go around in a pedicab.
long_definition: ^*pedicab, tricycle. BER-: ride a pedicab. *BER-_-_-AN: going here and there in a pedicab. TUKANG - : pedicab driver
vernacular_definition: Kendaraan umum beroda tiga dengan seorang sopir yang duduk di belakang.
example: Paling enak BERBECAK-BECAKAN keliling kota.

long_definition: *MEM--KAN: cause s.t. to be muddy, dirty
example: Setelah banjir besar, halaman rumah kami menjadi sangat BECEK

long_definition: capable, able.
vernacular_definition: Dapat melakukan sesuatu dengan benar; cakap.
example: Hanya disuruh menyapu begitu saja kok tidak BECUS.

definition: difference. BER-: to be different, have a difference. Also BER-_-_, BER--AN, +
long_definition: ^*difference. *BER-: to be different, have a difference of so much. BER-_-_, BER--AN: to be different from e.o. *MEM(PER)--KAN: 1 discriminate, treat differently. 2 distinguish, tell apart. *MEM-_-_-KAN: discriminate. PEM-: distinguishing feature. *PER--AN: difference.
example: PERBEDAAN diantara kita selalu ada.

long_definition: surgical operation. MEM-: to operate.
facial powder.
vernacular_definition: Serbuk halus untuk mengolesi muka; pupur.
example: Jangan terlalu tebal memakai BEDAK, nanti wajahmu jadi seperti topeng.

long_definition: gun, rifle, firearm.
vernacular_definition: Alat yang dipakai untuk menembak; senjata api.
example: BEDIL berukuran lebih panjang dibandingkan dengan pistol.

definition: large hanging drum used to summon people to prayer.
long_definition: large hanging drum used to summon people to prayer.
vernacular_definition: Benda yang mirip seperti gendang tetapi berukuran lebih besar.
example: Kalau BEDUG sudah berbunyi 12 kali itu tandanya waktu sholat dhuhur tiba.

definition: title for Hindu priest or ascetic (in shadow plays, etc.)
long_definition: title for Hindu priest or ascetic (in shadow plays, etc.)

definition: thus, like this; well, so (to start a conversation). Also SE-, MEM--KAN, +
long_definition: ^*1 thus, like this. 2 well, so (often used to start a conversation). *SE-: as . . . as this. MEM--KAN: treat in such-and-such a way. *-AN: (Coll.) s.t. like this.
example: Hanya SEBEGINI banyaknya uang yang kau dapat hari ini?

definition: like that; so, very (in superlative sense); just at the moment. Also -LAH, +
long_definition: ^*1 like that. 2 so, very (in superlative sense). 3 just at the moment, coincident with. -LAH: such, so it is, that is the case. *-PUN: 1 likewise, and so, also. 2 in spite of. *SE-: like that. MEM--KAN: treat s.o. like that.
vernacular_definition: seperti itu. sangat/berlebihan/terlalu. segera setelah. akronim:begini.
example: Mengapa SEBEGITU banyak permintaanmu?

long_definition: stupid, imbecilic, idiotic
example: Dasar kamu BEGO! mengapa kamu berikan uang itu pada Budi?

definition: stock, supplies, provisions. PER--AN: supplies, provisions.
long_definition: ^stock, supplies, provisions. PER--AN: supplies, provisions.
vernacular_definition: Barang yang dibawa selama dalam perjalanan.
example: Saya kira PERBEKALAN ini cukup untuk satu minggu.

definition: print, trace; former; used, second hand. Also BER-, MEM-, +
long_definition: ^*1 print, trace. 2 former. 3 used, second hand. *BER-, MEM-: 1 to have a print, leave a trace. 2 have results. -AN: second hand.
vernacular_definition: barang sisa. sudah pernah dipakai. pernah menjabat.
example: Mimpi buruk itu MEMBEKAS di hatinya.

definition: (Coll.) well known, familiar. MEM--KAN: cause s.o. to be well known. +
long_definition: (Coll.) well known, familiar. MEM--KAN: cause s.o. to be well known. KE--AN: fame, notoriety.
vernacular_definition: Diketahui banyak orang; terkenal; populer; dll.
example: Dia gunakan KEBEKENANnya untuk mendapatkan fasilitas-fasilitas.

long_definition: to work -- see KERJA

definition: crack, gap, crevice; half, cut in half; side. Also SE-, MEM-, -AN, PEM--AN.
long_definition: ^*1 crack, gap, crevice. 2 half, cut in half. 3 side. *SE-: 1 one half. 2 beside. 3 in the direction of. 4 part. *MEM-: 1 split, cleave, rip apart. 2 cut through, take a short-cut across. *-AN: 1 split, crack, cut. 2 splinter, fragment. 4 a slice. 5 half. *PEM--AN: fission. *--PIHAK: each sides (of negotiation, opinions, etc.)

long_definition: to study -- see AJAR

long_definition: ^*1 back, backside. 2 behind, back of. 3 later. MENGE--KAN: 1 move s.t. back. 2 turn back. 3 ignore, neglect. *TERKE-: 1 be left behind. 2 neglected. MEM-: turn o.'s back. *TER-: 1 last, latest. 2 retarded, backward. *KETER--AN: backwardness, underdevelopment, retardation. *-AN: later, eventually.

long_definition: MEM-: to open wide. TER-: boggle-eyed.

long_definition: *Dutch. *KE-_-_-AN: to think and act in a Dutch-like way.

long_definition: ^particolored, gaudy, spotted

long_definition: earthen cooking pot

definition: expense, expenditure; go shopping. Also BER-, MEM--KAN, -AN, +
long_definition: ^*1 expense, expenditure. 2 go shopping. *BER-: 1 to shop, go shopping. 2 buy, purchase. *MEM--KAN: spend s.t. *-AN: items purchased. *PEM--AN: financing. PER--AN: 1 expenses, budget. 2 financing.

long_definition: *not yet. *SE-: before.

long_definition: k.o. gardenia with edible leaves used for hedges.

example: "quick/fluid BRAINED") because of her intelligence.

SE--NYA: 1 in fact, as a matter of fact, actually. 2 proper, fitting. *MEM--KAN: 1 correct (a mistake). 2 straighten, arrange, fix. 3 confirm. 4 justify. *KE--AN: 1 correctness, rightness. 2 truth. 3 honesty.

dike, dam MEM- : 1. dam up; 2. dam, stem, check; 3. repress MEM- I : dam up TER- : 1. dammed (up); 2. held back -AN : 1. dike; 2. dam, weir PEM- : 1. one who checks or stems something; 2. something that dams up or stems PEM- -AN : 1. damming up; 2. impounding; 3. stemming, checking

long_definition: ^*audacious, bold, brave, courageous, dauntless. *MEM--KAN: encourage, foster. *KE--AN: bravery, courage, boldness, pluck. *PEM-: 1 courageous person. 2 daredevil.

long_definition: ^*1 heavy. 2 severe, serious. 3 hard, difficult. 4 weight. *MEM-: become heavy. *MEM--I: 1 weigh down. 2 weigh on. 3 burden. *MEM--KAN: 1 make things difficult for, worsen. 2 strengthen, stiffen. 3 stress, emphasize. 4 (Leg.) incriminate, implicate. *KE--AN: 1 objection. 2 be unwilling, disappointed.

k.o. fish--perch

long_definition: to be in effect; see LAKU

long_definition: well filled (of grains, fruit), well formed (of sugar cane).

long_definition: ^struggle, resist, rebel. MEM-: break away. PEM-: rebel. PEM--AN: rebellion, revolt.

bear

long_definition: wasteful lavish, extravagant. MEM-: be wasteful. MEM--KAN: waste, squander. KE--AN: wastefulness. PEM-: squanderer.

long_definition: Batak kinship term or a child of a clan

long_definition: 1. bald (headed) 2. strip completely bare.
bottle peM-an = bottling.

definition: a move from one place to another
long_definition: a move from one place to another BER- move, shift, change, remove emigrate, settle (ME)M- move, shift capture, take away something MEM- -KAN move something -AN moving, removal PEM- -AN emigration, settlement, colonization removal, shifting

long_definition: acronym for "Badan Pengawas Keuangan" or State Auditing Agency

long_definition: (Baden Penyelidik Usaha Persipan Kemerdekaan Indonesia) Investigating Committee for Preparatory Work for Indonesian Independence.

long_definition: ^1. rascal, scoundrel. 2. gangster or bandit. MEM-: commit a rascally act. KE--AN: villainy, wantonness.

^safe, strongbox

long_definition: ^1. useless, in bad condition. 2. Hell! It is all messed up! KE--AN: lousiness.

brocolli

long_definition: name of a volcano in East Java.
meM- = 1. fire a volley; 2. shell, bombard peM-an = bombardment - jagung = popcorn

long_definition: brochure. MEM--KAN: put in form of a brochure.

example: Kita perlu MEMBROSURKAN informasi mengenai turisme di daerah ini.

long_definition: see IBU.

definition: fruit; (after a number) = classifier for 3-dim. objects; SE- = one; a/an
long_definition: 1. fruit 2. (preceded by number) = classifier for 3-dimensional objects SE- ____: a/an (given entity); one (given entity).
vernacular_definition: Bagian tumbuhan yang berasal dari bunga. Untuk menyatakan nama bermacam-macam buah. Penolong bilangan bagi sesuatu yang tidak tentu bentuknya.

definition: BER-: to swing. MEM--KAN: to swing ot rock s.t. -AN: cradle.
long_definition: BER-: to swing. MEM--KAN: to swing or rock s.t. -AN: cradle.

definition: bubbling over (of liquid); boasting, big talk, bragging. Also BER-_-_, +
long_definition: ^*1 bubbling over (of liquid). 2 boasting, big talk, bragging. *BER-_-_, MEM-_-_: 1 bubble up, fizz, foam (of liquid). 2 brag, boast, talk big. *MEM--KAN: 1 spout, expel (a liquid). 2 brag about s.t. also: BER-_-_: to talk, discuss.
example: Orang-orang desa sering duduk dan BERBUAL-BUAL di kedai kopi.

definition: throw away. MEM-: throw away, discard.
long_definition: ^*throw away. *MEM-: throw away, discard.

example: MEMBUANG puntung rokok disembarang tempat merusak kebersihan.

long_definition: ^ *1. liberal, generous 2. extravagant 3. prodigal
example: *Endang dikenal bersifat BUAR

long_definition: ^ wild, furious, savage, desolate MEM-: to fly into a passion, to rage, to take on KE-AN: fury, wildness, savagery
example: Banyak jenis binatang BUAS saat ini dilindungi pemerintah

definition: do, make; for; in order to. BER-: do, act. Also MEM-, -AN, PEM-, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^*1 do, make. 2 for. 3 in order to. *BER-: do, act. *MEM-: 1 make. 2 do. 3 cause. *-AN: 1 make, brand. 2 product. 3 artificial, false. *PEM-: maker, producer. *PER--AN: 1 action. 2 performance. 3 conduct.
example: Segala PERBUATAN baik dan buruk ada akibatnya.

long_definition: 1 crocodile. 2 scoundrel.
vernacular_definition: Reptilia yang berkulit keras dan bermulut lebar/panjang.
example: Kata orang-orang BUAYA putih di telaga itu sangat keramat.

definition: dispersal, break up (of a group). MEM--KAN: disperse s.t., break up a group.
long_definition: ^disperse, break up (of a group). MEM--KAN: disperse s.t., break up a group.
example: Sudah lama partai komunis itu MEMBUBARKAN diri.

definition: MEM-: to put or place s.t. MEM--I: make an addition to s.t. Also MEM--KAN, +
long_definition: ^MEM-: to put or place s.t. MEM--I: make an addition to s.t. MEM--KAN: add s.t. to s.t. -AN: an addition.
example: Saya juga akan MEMBUBUHKAN tanda tangan saya untuk petisi itu.

definition: powder. MEM-: to become powder; to grind s.t. into powder.
long_definition: powder. MEM-: 1 to become powder. 2 to grind s.t. into powder.

example: Karena lamanya ditumbuk akhirnya biji-bijian itu MEMBUBUK juga.

definition: top, ridge; ridgepole. -AN: ridge (of house); ridgepole.
long_definition: ^1 top, ridge. 2 ridgepole. *-AN: 1 ridge (of house). 2 ridgepole.
example: BUBUNGAN rumahmu tinggi sekali.

long_definition: porridge (usually of rice, corn, etc.).
vernacular_definition: Makanan lembek dan berair biasanya terbuat dari tepung beras atau umbi.
example: there is no use crying over spilt milk).

long_definition: ^ 1. stay 2. draw, haulagerope -AN: stay (ship) *MEM-: 1. to pull out, to draw 2. to turn PEm-AN: 1. fitting-shop 2. a bird (Centropus eurycerus)
example: *Petani MEMBUBUT rerumputan sebelum memulai penanam padi

definition: servant or slave. Also MEMPER-, MEM--KAN, PER--AN.
long_definition: servant or slave. MEMPER-, MEM--KAN: enslave or treat as a slave. PER--AN: slavery.
vernacular_definition: Anak kecil; hamba sahaya; jongos; abdi.
example: Seluruh bentuk PERBUDAKAN di muka bumi harus dihapus.

long_definition: ^culture, customary practice. BER-: to have a culture, be cultured. MEM-: to become customary, become a part of the culture. MEM--KAN: to civilize, make cultured. KE--AN: culture.
vernacular_definition: Akal budi manusia; pikiran; hasil karya yang diciptakan oleh manusia.
example: Adanya uang sogok sudah MEMBUDAYA di kantor ini.

definition: mind, character. BER-: be of good character.
long_definition: ^mind, character. BER-: be of good character.

example: Hutang BUDI tidak bisa dibayar dengan uang.

long_definition: cultivation *MEM-KAN: cultivate
example: *Departemen pertanian MEMBUDIDAYAKAN penanaman kacang merah di halaman rumah

long_definition: completely naked mata - = naked eyes

definition: ethnic group native to the region of the Celebees.
long_definition: *ethnic group native to the region of the Celebees.

example: Suami saya orang BUGIS.

long_definition: foam, froth BER- -2, MEM- -2 foam up MEM- -KAM cause to foam PEM- -AN act of causing something to foam
unmarried person.

long_definition: sweet-talk, persuade.
vernacular_definition: Kata-kata manis yang dipakai sebagai usaha untuk meyakinkan orang; rayu.

long_definition: lengthwise; longitudinal *-SANGKAR = 1. rectangle; 2. square *MEM- = stretch out; lie alongside; stretch *TER- = stretched out *-AN = length
example: BUJURAN pipa itu mencapai desa terpencil

definition: open. MEM-: open; to begin or start s.t. Also MEM--KAN, TER-, KETER--AN, +
long_definition: ^*open. *MEM-: 1 to open. 2 to begin or start something. *MEM--KAN: 1 open. 2 open for s.o. *TER-: 1 opened. 2 outgoing, extroverted. *KETER--AN: openness. PEM--AN: opening, beginning. *--PUASA: to break the fasting (usually during the month of Ramadhan).
example: Sifat KETERBUKAAN sangat penting dalam organisasi.

definition: no, not; it is not the case that; isn't it? aren't you? etc. Also -NYA.

example: BUKANNYA saya tidak menyenangimu, saya hanya tidak percaya padamu.

long_definition: hill, mountain. MEM--: piled up, to form a mountain, hilly. PER--AN: hilly (area).
vernacular_definition: Gundukan tanah yang tinggi tetapi tidak setinggi gunung.

long_definition: ^*proof, evidence. *MEM--KAN: prove, demonstrate. PEM--AN: authentication. *TER--: proved.
example: Sangat sulit untuk MEMBUKTIKAN teorimu.

long_definition: *book.
vernacular_definition: Sejumlah lembaran kertas yang menjadi satu.
example: Saya memerlukan tiga BUKU tulis untuk kelas ini.

definition: 1. spherical. 2. complete. 3. unanimous. Also SE--NYA, MEM-, MEM--I, MEM--KAN+
long_definition: ^1. spherical, round. 2. complete, overall. 3. unanimous. SE--NYA: completely. MEM-: 1. become round. 2. be unanimous. MEM--I: draw circle around s.t. MEM--KAN: 1. round off. 2. perfect s.t. KE--AN: 1. roundedness. 2. resoluteness. 3. unanimity. -AN: circle. PEM--AN: rounding off, completing.

long_definition: k.o. bird, tropical nightingale
white person.
(Badan Urusan Logistik Nasional) National Logistical Supply Organization.
body hair, fur, feather *BER- : have body hair, fur, feather *---TANGKIS: badminton

vernacular_definition: - perindu = mythical k.o. bamboo used to make flutes that produce melodies irresistible to women.
example: PEMBULUH nadi orang itu tersumbat

long_definition: *cooking spices. *MEM-I: to season food.
vernacular_definition: Bahan untuk memberi rasa pada makanan (garam, merica, bawang putih, dll).
example: Tidak mudah MEMBUMBUI masakan Jawa.

long_definition: earth, soil. MEM--HANGUSKAN: subject to scorched-earth policy.
example: Kaisar Nero MEMBUMIHANGUSKAN kota Roma.

long_definition: native (of country) ke-an = nativeness, indigenousness

definition: acronym for Badan Usaha Milik Negara or State-Owned Enterprises
long_definition: acronym for State-Owned Enterprises
example: Mulai tahun depan semua BUMN harus menjadi badan usaha swasta

long_definition: stringbean.
vernacular_definition: Sayuran hijau yang berbentuk panjang dan ada biji kecil-kecil di dalamnya.
example: Semur daging ini enak dimakan dengan BUNCIS dan wortel rebus.

long_definition: mother.

long_definition: round, circular. MEM-: form a circle. -AN: circle, traffic circle.
example: Kantor ayahku ada di dekat BUNDARAN Semanggi.

definition: 1. fellow, buddy; 2. brother (affectionate title for some popular leader)
long_definition: 1. fellow, buddy; 2. brother (affectionate title for some popular leader)
example: Proklamasi

long_definition: flower
vernacular_definition: Bagian tumbuhan yang akan menjadi buah. Jenis bagi bermacam-macam bunga
example: BUNGA mawar itu cantik sekali.

definition: silent, quiet, speechless. MEM-: remain silent. KE--AN: silence.
long_definition: silent, quiet, speechless. MEM-: remain silent. KE--AN: silence.
example: KEBUNGKAMAN orang itu menimbulkan kecurigaan banyak orang.

long_definition: crooked, bent (over), humped *MEM- = stoop or bend over; bowed respectfully
example: Orang Jepang mempunyai kebiasaan MEMBUNGKUK sebagai tanda penghormatan kepada orang lain

definition: parcel, pack; wrapper, wrap. BER-: wrapped up. Also MEM-, -AN.
long_definition: ^*1 parcel, pack. 2 wrapper, wrap. *BER-: wrapped up. *MEM-: to wrap up s.t. *-AN: parcel, package.
vernacular_definition: Barang yang dipakai untuk membalut/menutupi sesuatu.
example: Ada sebuah BUNGKUSAN di depan pintu.

long_definition: chameleon.

definition: the youngest child in a family.
long_definition: *the youngest child in a family.

example: Kok manja sekali anak BUNGSUmu.

definition: ritual feast of the Lawangan Dayaks.
long_definition: ritual feast of the Lawangan Dayaks.

definition: pregnant (of animals), full (as of heads of rice).
long_definition: pregnant (said of animals, derogatorily of women), full (as of heads of rice).

long_definition: blocked.
example: Ini jalan BUNTU, tidak ada terusannya.

definition: tail, rear end, latter part of s.t. Also BER-, MEM--I.
long_definition: ^tail, rear end, latter part of s.t. BER-: 1 to have a tail. 2 to have consequences. MEM--I: to trail behind, follow closely.
example: Saya merasa ada yang MEMBUNTUTI kita sejak dari belokan itu.

definition: to kill. MEM-: to kill. PEM-: killer. PEM--AN: murder.
long_definition: *to kill. *MEM-: to kill. *PEM-: killer. PEM--AN: murder.
example: Kabarnya presiden itu DIBUNUH oleh PEMBUNUH BAYARAN.

definition: sound, noise; contents (of a letter, signboard, etc.). BER-: to make a noise.
long_definition: ^*1 sound, noise. 2 contents (of a letter, signboard, etc.) *BER-: to make a noise.
example: Peluit tanda pertandingan selesai sudah BERBUNYI.

definition: regent, officer occupying the position of head of a regency.
long_definition: regent, officer occupying the position of head of a regency.
example: BUPATI Blambangan terkenal karena sangat angkuhnya.

long_definition: fugitive (from justice); s.o. wanted *--AN: fugitive
example: Koruptor itu menjadi BURON dan melarikan diri ke luar negeri

long_definition: stock exchange
example: Dia bekerja di perusahaan BURSA saham yang terbesar di Jakarta

definition: to chase. BER-: to go hunting. Also MEM-, PEM-, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^*to chase. *BER-: to go hunting. *TER-_-_: to hurry, be in a rush. *MEM-: to chase after. *PEM-: hunter. *PER--AN: the hunt.
example: PERBURUAN gajah sudah dilarang di Indonesia.

definition: worker, laborer. MEM-: to do manual labor. PER--AN: manual labor.
long_definition: ^worker, laborer. MEM-: to do manual labor. PER--AN: manual labor.
vernacular_definition: Orang yang bekerja pada pihak lain untuk mendapat upah; pekerja.
example: Masalah-masalah PERBURUHAN akan menjadi sangat menonjol pada dekade mendatang.

definition: old, rotten, decayed. KE--AN: evil, badness, wickedness. Also PEM--AN.
long_definition: ^old, rotten, decayed. KE--AN: evil, badness, wickedness. PEM--AN: decay, deterioration.
example: PEMBURUKAN kesehatan masyarakat di desa ini sangat memprihatinkan.

long_definition: *any kind of bird. (The picture shows BURUNG CENDERAWASIH -- "bird of paradise" or paradisae raggiana)
vernacular_definition: binatang yang mempunyai bulu dan bisa terbang.
example: Kakaktua adalah sejenis BURUNG.

long_definition: foam, lather, scum, suds, sponges *BER--: be full of foam *MEM--: become foamy
example: BUSA ini tidak dapat lagi dipakai untuk mencuci piring

definition: clothing, fashion. MEM--KAN: cause s.o. to wear clothing.
long_definition: clothing, fashion. MEM--KAN: cause s.o. to wear clothing. BER-: wear clothing.
example: Dalam pesta perkawinan itu banyak tamu yang BERBUSANA batik.

long_definition: damn it!, bullshit!
vernacular_definition: Kata seru sebagai tanda keheranan atau umpatan.
example: BUSET! berani betul anak itu ngebut di jalan yang sempit.

definition: 1. putrid, rotten, decomposed. 2. low, depraved, corrupt. Also MEM-, MEM--KAN,+
long_definition: ^1. putrid, rotten, decomposed. 2. low, depraved, corrupt. MEM-: 1. rot, decay. 2. become infested. MEM--KAN: 1. cause to rot. 2. slander, defame. KE--AN: rotteness, badness, evil. PEM--AN: decaying. PER--AN: decayed state.
vernacular_definition: Benda yang rusak dan berbau tidak sedap; perbuatan yang tidak baik/buruk/jahat; dll.
example: PEMBUSUKAN daging ini kira-kira memakan waktu tiga hari.

long_definition: *-- DADA: proud, conceited *-- LAPAR: bloating due to starvation *MEM-- : bloated, puff up *MEM--KAN: pump up, inflate
vernacular_definition: menggembung, menggelembung, membengkak, membesar karena penyakit
example: Dia MEMBUSUNGKAN perutnya dan tertawa

long_definition: cotton gin MEM- gin (cotton)

definition: 1. blind. 2. blank. 3. forgetful. 4. unknowledgeable. KE--HURUFAN: illiteracy.+
long_definition: ^1. blind. 2. blank. 3. forgetful. 4. unknowledgeable. KE--HURUFAN: illiteracy. MEM-: 1. become blind. 2. pretend to be blind. 3. be reckless or rash. MEM--KAN: blind or strike blind. MEM--TULIKAN: keep s.o. completely in the dark. KE--AN: 1. blindness. 2. darkness.
vernacular_definition: Tidak dapat melihat karena rusak matanya; tidak tahu; tidak mengerti.
example: KEBUTAAN anak itu disebabkan karena kerusakan pada selaput matanya.

definition: 1. grain. 2. classifier for round objects. 3. small objects. 4. item. +
long_definition: ^1. grain, granulate. 2. numeral classifier for round objects. 3. small objects. 4. item (in a list). SE-: a, one (thing the size of a grain). MEM-: granulate. -AN: 1. grains. 2. small objects.
vernacular_definition: Brang kecil-kecil bulat seperti beras, peluru, dll; kata bantu bilangan; perincian dari suatu keseluruhan.
example: BUTIRAN biji-biji ini yang nantinya akan menjadi tumbuhan.

definition: 1. need, necessity. 2. (Coll.) penis. MEM--KAN: need. KE--AN: need, necessity.
long_definition: ^1. need, necessity. 2. (Coll.) penis. MEM--KAN: need, require. KE--AN: need, necessity.
example: KEBUTUHAN akan sandang dan pangan adalah KEBUTUHAN utama kita.

long_definition: scattered, dispersed, blown about *MEM--KAN: scatter, disperse; interrupt
example: Kini harapanku untuk sekolah menjadi BUYAR karena ayahku tidak mampu membiayai lagi

definition: red pepper, chili. KE--AN: feel hot about the lips from chilis.
long_definition: red pepper, chili. KE--AN: feel hot about the lips from chilis.
vernacular_definition: Buah dari tanaman lombok yang pedas rasanya; lombok.
example: Mengapa engkau seperti orang KECABAIAN (gelisah)?

definition: branch, bough; branch (of an office, etc.); chapter, affiliate. Also BER-.
long_definition: ^*1 branch, bough. 2 branch (office, department, etc.), subsidiary. 3 chapter, affiliate (of an organization). *BER-: to have branches.
vernacular_definition: Ranting/batang kayu yang tumbuh dari pokok tanaman. Bagian yang terpisah dari induknya.
example: Perusahaan ini mempunyai banyak anak CABANG.

definition: 1. cowardly. 2. discouraged. 3. careless. MEN--KAN: 1. discourage. 2. frighten.+
long_definition: ^1. cowardly, timorous. 2. discouraged, dejected. 3. careless, unheeding. MEN--KAN: 1. discourage. 2. frighten. KE--AN: discouragement.
example: KECABARAN hatinya membuatku ragu untuk mengajaknya bicara.

definition: 1. torn, ripped. 2. piece, strip. MEN-: repeatedly tear at. Also MEN-(-KAN), +
long_definition: ^1. torn, ripped. 2. piece, strip. MEN-: repeatedly tear at. MEN-(-KAN): 1. rip. 2. lacerate. TER-: 1. be torn. 2. shredded. PEN--AN: laceration.
vernacular_definition: Membelah sesuatu menjadi kecil-kecil; sayat; robek; koyak; dll.
example: PENCABIKAN benang ini banyak memakan waktu.

long_definition: *BER-AN: in tatters, in shreds
example: * Baju pengemis itu BERCABIRAN

definition: indecent, pornographic. BER-: have illicit sextual relations. 2. rage, spread. +

MEN--KAN: to frighten or worry s.o. or s.t. KE--AN: anxiety, apprehension. PEN-: a worrier, a coward, or s.o. given to anxiety.

long_definition: Deparlu is an abbreviation of Departemen Luar Negeri or Department of Foreign Affairs.
example: Jonet bekerja di DEPARLU (Departemen Luar Negeri)

long_definition: *department.
example: Saya bekerja di DEPARTEMEN pendidikan

example: DEPRAGRI (Departemen Dalam Negeri) memantau jalannya pemilihan umum

long_definition: Deperdag is an abbreviation of Departemen Perdagangan or Department of Commerce
Depertan is an abbreviation of Departemen Pertanian or Department of Agriculture
Depkeh is an abbreviation of Departemen Kehakiman or Department of Justice
Depkes is an abbreviation of Departemen Kesehatan or Department of Health

long_definition: Depkeu is an abbreviation of Departemen Keuangan or Department of Finance
Depnaker is an abbreviation of Departemen Tenaga Kerja or Department of Labor
example: DEPNAKER (Departemen Tenaga Kerja) tidak mampu menyediakan informasi tentang peluang kerja

sound of heavy rainfall.

example: ** Gerakan mahasiswa MENGGAGAS sistem pemilihan umum yang demokratis

pole.

long_definition: abbreviation of "Gerakan Aceh Merdeka" or "Free Aceh Movement"

MENG--KAN: 1 underline, underscore s.t.). 2 trace the lines of. 3 outline. TER-: be scratched into s.t. -AN: 1 ruler. 2 line etched or drawn. PENG-: ruler. PE--AN: indication by lines. PENG--AN: 1 drawing lines. 2 line, policies set.

1.snarl, snapping. 2. threaten. *MENG--(I): 1. snap at. 2.threaten s.o. 3. spur (a horse). 4.gnash (teeth). *MENG--KAN: intimidate, gnash o's teeth. *--AN: snarling, snapping, threat, intimidation. *PENG--: s.o. who snarls, intimidator, threatening person. *--SAMBAL: empty bluff.

bequest, grant, donate *MENG--KAN: give grant, award; donate
example: Saya sudah ikhlas MENGHIBAHKAN tanah ini untuk membangun mesjid

definition: entertain. MENG--KAN: cheer s.o. up. -AN: entertainment.
long_definition: entertain. *MENG-: to cheer up, entertain. MENG--KAN: cheer s.o. up. *-AN: entertainment.
example: Nonton bioskop adalah satu-satunya HIBURANku.

definition: serve, present. MENG--KAN: serve or present s.t. (food, drink, etc.) Also -AN.
long_definition: serve, present. *MENG--KAN: serve or present s.t. (food, drink, etc.) *-AN: s.t. served up or presented.
example: HIDANGAN ini akan lebih nikmat bila dimakan panas-panas.

long_definition: *nose.
vernacular_definition: Alat pencium yang terletak di bawah mata.
example: Hati-hati jangan sampai kau terperangkap oleh si HIDUNG BELANG itu.

definition: live, life. MENG--KAN: bring s.t. to life, turn s.t. on. Also KE--AN, PENG--AN.
long_definition: live, life. *MENG--KAN: bring s.t. to life, turn s.t. on (machine, light). *KE--AN: life. *PENG--AN: o.'s livelihood.
example: Sulit mencari PENGHIDUPAN di kota besar bagi saya.

long_definition: *1 green. 2 inexperienced.
vernacular_definition: Jenis warna campuran antara kuning dan biru.
example: Warna kupu-kupu itu merah KEHIJAU-HIJAUAN.

long_definition: wisdom, philosophy
example: Jangan bersedih, ambillah HIKMAH kejadian ini

definition: to be lost, disappear. MENG-: to vanish. Also MENG--KAN, PENG--AN.
long_definition: to be lost, disappear. *MENG-: to vanish. *MENG--KAN: to make vanish, to erase. PENG--AN: elimination.
example: Si Tarjo yang MENGHILANGKAN kunci mobil ayah.

long_definition: MENG-: go downstream.
vernacular_definition: Bagian muara sungai; daerah pesisir; daerah tempat berakhirnya sungai.
example: Kami akan MENGHILIR pagi ini.

long_definition: see IMBAU

definition: BER-: pressed together, very close together. MENG-: squeeze, press.
long_definition: BER-: pressed together, very close together. MENG-: squeeze, press.
example: Dia tidak bisa berkutik ketika kaki lawan MENGHIMPITnya.

definition: BER-: assemble, gather. -AN: 1. association, club. 2. collection, compilation.
long_definition: MENG-: assemble, gather. -AN: 1. association, club. 2. collection, compilation.
example: Ini adalah HIMPUNAN bilangan prima.

definition: comtemtible, humble. MENG-: humiliate, insult, offend. KE--AN: 1. humbleness. +
long_definition: contemptible, humble. MENG-: humiliate, insult, offend. KE--AN: 1. humbleness. 2. humiliation.
vernacular_definition: Perbuatan yang tidak baik; keji; tercela; rendah martabatnya.
example: Gadis itu jatuh ke lembah KEHINAAN.

definition: MENG-: 1. pull to one side. 2. avoid (a blow). Also MENG--I, MENG--KAN, TER- +
long_definition: MENG-: 1. pull to one side. 2. avoid ( a blow). MENG--I: avoid s.t. MENG--KAN: put s.t. out of the way so that it will be avoided. TER-: spared. TER--KAN: can be avoided. PENG-: evader.
example: Kecelakaan itu tak dapat TERHINDARKAN.

long_definition: ^Hindu.
example: Hampir seluruh penduduk Bali beragama HINDU.

definition: until, up to. SE-: 1 until; with the result that.
long_definition: ^*until, up to. *SE-: 1 until. 2 with the result that.
example: Saya tidur terlalu larut malam SEHINGGA sulit bagiku untuk bangun terlalu pagi.

definition: perch, alight; attack (of disease, infection, etc.)
long_definition: ^*1 perch, alight. 2 attack (of disease, infection, etc.) *MENG-(-I): alight on s.t.
vernacular_definition: Berhenti disuatu tempat setelah terbang (biasanya untuk burung).
example: Walaupun sudah biasa berpidato dia masih saja DIHINGGAPI rasa ragu-ragu pada awalnya.

definition: young Western traveler on a low budget
long_definition: ^1.young Western traveler on a low budget 2. a style of Western-influenced grooming characterizes by unkempt hai and clothing
^hypnotic *MENG-: hypnotize
example: *Ahmad berjalan seperti orang yang telah DIHIPNOTIS

definition: MENG--KAN: pay attention to, notice, heed.
long_definition: MENG--KAN: pay attention to, notice, heed.
example: Anak itu tidak pernah MENGHIRAUKAN nasehat orang tuanya.

long_definition: racket, uproar.
example: Suasana di pasar itu sungguh HIRUK-PIKUK.

definition: MENG-: draw on, inhale; slurp up s.t.; sniff in. -AN: whiff, sniff.
long_definition: ^*MENG-: 1 draw on, inhale (cigarette, etc.). 2 slurp up or sip s.t. 3 sniff in. -AN: whiff, sniff.
example: Nikmat sekali rasanya MENGHIRUP kopi ini pelan-pelan.

long_definition: see ISAP.
historic.
example: Secara HISTORIS ke dua negara memang selalu bermusuhan.

definition: black. MENG-: become black. Also MENG--I, MENG--KAN, KE--AN.
long_definition: black *MENG-: become black. MENG--I: blacken (hair, teeth). *MENG--KAN: blacken (hair, teeth); blacken, denigrate, sully (a reputation). *KE--AN: blackness.
example: Pilihlah anggur yang berwarna ungu KEHITAMAN, biasanya manis rasanya.

definition: BER-: to count. Also MENG-, MEMPER--KAN, TER-, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^BER-: to count. *MENG-: 1 to count or do arithmatic. 2 to consider, to calculate or reckon. *MEMPER--KAN: 1 calculate, estimate. 2 take into consideration. *TER-: counted, included. *PER--AN: computation, consideration.
example: Karena salah PERHITUNGAN menyebabkan acara menjadi berantakan.

long_definition: shark kind of big fish
example: HIU sangat peka terhadap bau darah

definition: (Himpunan Mahasiwa Muslim Indonesia) Indonesian Islamic Students Association
long_definition: Indonesian Islamic Students Association
good luck.
example: Hari ini aku sedang HOKI makanya aku menang terus.

long_definition: hockey.
vernacular_definition: Nama suatu permainan seperti sepak bola yang menggunakan tongkat sebagai alat pemukul.
example: Permainan HOKKI masih belum terlalu populer di Indonesia.

definition: 1. honorary. 2. not officially confirmed and so paid by stipends, not by salary.
long_definition: 1. honorary. 2. not officially confirmed and so paid by stipends, not salaries.
vernacular_definition: Pekerja sementara/temporari (belum ditetapkan untuk mwndapat gaji tetap).
example: Di sini dia hanya sebagai pekerja HONORER.

long_definition: horizon.
vernacular_definition: Langit yang berbatasan dengan permukaan bumi/laut; cakrawala; kaki langit.

definition: 1. honor, respect, esteem. 2. respectful. BER-: 1. pay respect. 2. respected. +
long_definition: ^1. honor, respect, esteem. 2. respectful. BER-: 1. pay respect. 2. respected (person). BER--AN, MENG--I: 1. show mutual respect. 2. salute s.o. 3. honor, respect. KE--AN: honor, honorary.
example: KEHORMATAN kami tidak dapat dibeli dengan uang.

long_definition: *hotel.
example: Sekarang ini sedang dibangun HOTEL berbintang lima di kotaku.

definition: BER-: connected, related. Also BER--AN, MENG--I, MENG--KAN, -AN, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^BER-: connected, related. *BER--AN: 1 related to s.t. 2 be in contact with s.o. *MENG--I: get in touch with. *MENG--KAN: connect, join. *-AN: connection, relationship. *PER--AN: relationship, communications.
example: Semua ini adalah di bawah wewenang menteri PERHUBUNGAN luar negeri.

definition: rain. KE--AN: caught out in the rain.
long_definition: rain. *KE--AN: caught out in the rain.
vernacular_definition: Air yang jatuh dari langit karena proses pendinginan.
example: Sekarang Anto sakit karena kemarin KEHUJANAN.

definition: law; verdict. MENG-: punish; criticize or judge s.o. Also -AN.
long_definition: ^1 law. 2 verdict. *MENG-: 1 punish 2 criticize or judge s.o. *-AN: punishment.
vernacular_definition: Peraturan yang dibuat untuk mengatur suatu hal.
example: HUKUMAN yang dijatuhkan si hakim itu terlalu berat.

definition: see HULU1 (upper reaches of a river . . .) or HULU2 (upper end of s.t. . . .).
long_definition: see HULU1 (upper reaches of a river . . .) HULU2 (upper end of s.t., hilt . . .).

definition: upper reaches of a river; the beginning of s.t. Also MENG-, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^1 the upper reaches of a river. 2 the beginning of s.t. MENG-: 1 to go upriver. 2 to go to headquarters. PER--AN: the interior of a land region.
example: Setelah bekerja keras selama sepuluh tahun akhirnya kariernya MENGHULU juga.

definition: upper end (of pole); hilt (of knife, sword); crown of the head. Also MENG--KAN.
long_definition: ^1 upper end (of a pole). 2 hilt (of knife, sword, etc.). 3 crown of the head. MENG--KAN: to function as the leader of s.t.
vernacular_definition: Bagian atas/pegangan dari pisau, keris, pedang; mahkota di atas kepala(bagian ujung dari kepala).
example: Kami MENGHULUKAN kepala desa untuk memimpin upacara ini.

long_definition: contraction of "Hubungan Masyarakat," or Public Relations.
joke. *CERITA--: funny story.
example: Sebaiknya kamu hentikan HUMORmu yang tidak lucu itu

definition: BER-: occupied. MENG-: occupy, dwell or reside in. Also MENG--KAN, PE(NG)-, +
long_definition: BER-: occupied. MENG-: occupy, dwell or reside in. MENG--KAN: cause s.o. to settle. PE(NG)-: 1. occupant, inhabitant. 2. inmate. 3. guardian, spirit. KEPENG--AN, PENG--AN: occuoancy.
example: Kami adalah PENGHUNI rumah ini.

long_definition: MENG-- : to stab; to thrust (usually a knife) on to something MENG--KAN : thrust, inserting
vernacular_definition: Menusukkan sesuatu (biasanya pisau) ke sebuah benda
example: Dia berteriak keras sambil MENGHUNJAMKAN tongkat itu ke tanah

long_definition: pleasure, entertainment. BER--: to have pleasure.

example: Coba untuk belajar lebih keras, jangan hanya BERHURA-HURA saja setiap hari.

long_definition: *letter or character (in writing).
vernacular_definition: Unsur dari abjad yang melambangkan bunyi.
example: Ketika masih kecil saya diajar membaca HURUF arab.

long_definition: hush!
example: Hus!...Diam!

vernacular_definition: Tanah luas yang ditumbuhi banyak pohon dan dihuni binatang-binatang.
example: Saya bersekolah di fakultas KEHUTANAN.

definition: debt. BER-: to owe s.t. MEMPER--KAN: to lend s.t. to s.o. Also PENG-.
long_definition: ^debt. BER-: to owe s.t. MEMPER--KAN: to lend s.t. to s.o. PENG-: a debtor.
example: Hari-hatilah dengan lintah darat yang suka MEMPERHUTANGKAN uangnya dengan bunga yang tinggi itu.

definition: MENG--KAN: cause to sway or stagger. TER-_-_: to stagger.
long_definition: MENG--KAN: cause to sway or stagger. TER-_-_: to stagger.
example: Dengan TERHUYUNG-HUYUNG nenekku berjalan menyambut kedatanganku.

definition: (Ch) popular game of numbers for gambling
long_definition: (Ch) popular game of numbers for gambling

long_definition: see IA1 = (he, she, it . . .) IA2 = (yes . . .)
*he, she, it.
vernacular_definition: Kata ganti untuk orang ketiga perempuan dan laki-laki. Sinonim: dia.
example: Mengapa IA yang harus melakukannya.

long_definition: ^yes. *BER-_-_: to always say yes, agree. *MENG--KAN: agree with s.t.

definition: acronym for "Institut Agama Islam Negeri" (Nat'l Institute of Islamic Religion).
long_definition: acronym for "Institut Agama Islam Negeri" (National Institute of Islamic Religion), a university-level school of Islamic studies.

definition: pity, compassion. KE--AN: emotion, compassion. TERIBA-IBA: emotionally.
long_definition: pity, compassion. KE--AN: emotion, compassion. TERIBA-IBA = emotionally.
example: Ia menangis TERIBA-IBA mendengar nasib anak kecil itu.

long_definition: see IBADAT.

definition: religious service. BER-: be religiously pious; worship.
long_definition: religious service. *BER-: 1 be religiously pious. 2 worship.
example: Si Amir terkenal sangat alim dan kuat BERIBADAH.

definition: like, also MENG-KAN : compare s.t, say s.t. is like, utter a comparison, treat like s.t.
long_definition: *like *MENG-KAN : compare s.t, say s.t. is like, utter a comparison, treat like s.t.
example: Saya DIIBARATKANNYA sebagai kuda (pekerja) saja

long_definition: Abraham.
vernacular_definition: Seorang nabi dalam kepercayaan agama Yahudi, Kristen, dan Islam.

definition: short for Indonesia Bagian Timur = Eastern part of Indonesia
long_definition: acronym for Indonesia Bagian Timur: the Eastern Part of Indonesia
primary grades in religious school (Islam).

definition: mother; term of address for older women or those of higher social status.
long_definition: *1 mother. 2 term of address for older women or those of higher social status (often shortened to "Bu").

example: Tata krama telah diajarkan oleh IBU sejak kami kecil.

long_definition: capital city
example: Jakarta adalah IBUKOTA Indonesia

long_definition: (Ikatan Cendekiawan Muslim Indonesia) Association of Muslim Intellectuals.
