long_definition: telephone. *BER-: use the telephone. *MEN-: to call s.o on the telephone, talk to s.o. on the phone.
example: Sudah hampir dua jam dia MENELEPON pacarnya.

long_definition: bay, gulf.
face downward. *MEN--: lie face downward. *MEN--I: lie face downward on s.t. *MEN--KAN: place s.t. face downward. *TER--: flat on o's face.
example: Karena lantai licin, Susi jatuh TERTELUNGKUP di depan pintu

long_definition: egg. *BER-: to lay eggs.
example: Aneh kalau ada ikan paus bisa BERTELUR.

long_definition: *MEN--I : go along, follow *MEN-- : unravel, investigate, explore *PEN--AN: investigation
example: Selama ini PENELUSURAN kami berjalan lancar

long_definition: theme, topic *BER-KAN: have as a theme
example: Malam Kebudayaan ini BERTEMAKAN rasa persatuan Indonesia

definition: friend, companion. BER-: to have friends, be friends with. Also MEN--I.
long_definition: friend, companion. *BER-: to have friends, be friends with. *MEN--I: accompany s.o.
example: Saya akan MENEMANI tante saya berjalan-jalan.

long_definition: *copper.
example: Saya kira semua perhiasan itu emas murni ternyata hanya TEMBAGA.

long_definition: fire a weapon. PEN--AN: shooting.
vernacular_definition: Melepaskan peluru dari senapan; bidik; bedi.
example: PENEMBAKAN terhadap para demonstran dikecam oleh seluruh dunia.

long_definition: tobacco
example: Di kampung kami ada banyak sekali perkebunan TEMBAKAU

definition: sung or recited Javanese poetry; a song
long_definition: MEN- = recite or sing Javanese poetry (usually accompanied by gamelan music). MEN-KAN = sing or recite PEN- = singer with gamelan orchestra
example: PENEMBANG itu sangat populer di daerah kami

long_definition: ^concrete wall.

definition: MEN-: perforate; emerge; penetrate. MEN--I: penetrate s.t. Also TER-, -AN.
long_definition: ^MEN-: 1 perforate. 2 emerge. 3 penetrate. MEN--I: penetrate s.t. TER-: perforated, penetrated. -AN: perforation, penetration, carbon copy.
vernacular_definition: Masuk ke tempat lain; terobos; merembes.
example: Ini jalan TEMBUSAN ke desa sebelah.

long_definition: see TEMAN.

definition: place, location. SE-: at the same place. Also MEN--I, MEN--KAN.
long_definition: ^place, location. *SE-: at the same place. *MEN--I: to occupy (a place). *MEN--KAN: to locate something at a place.
example: Anak-anak memang berdisiplin; mereka selalu MENEMPATKAN semua barang-barangnya dengan teratur.

long_definition: *a k.o. fermented soybean patty.
vernacular_definition: Kedelai utuh atau yang sudah terbelah yang difermentasikan.
example: TEMPE merupakan makanan asli orang Jawa.

definition: adhere, patch. BER-, MEN-: adhere, patch. Also MEN--I, MEN--KAN, -AN, PEN-.
long_definition: ^1. adhere. 2. patch. BER-, MEN-: 1. adhere, stick. 2, patch. MEN--I: stick to, make s.t. stick to. MEN--KAN: stick s.t. on. -AN: sticker, poster. 2. attached to s.o. or s.t. PEN-: instrument or person that sticks s.t. up.

definition: MEN-(-I): to slap on the face or ears.
long_definition: MEN-(-I): to slap on the face or ears.
example: Sekarang guru tak boleh MENEMPELENG murid lagi.

long_definition: 1. time. 2. name of a magazine.
vernacular_definition: 1. waktu; masa. 2. nama majalah mingguan yang dibreidel pemerintah Indonesia pada tahun 1994.
example: Majalah TEMPO dibreidel oleh pemerintah Indonesia pada tahun 1994.

definition: MEN-: attack; go through, endure. Also KE--AN, -AN.
long_definition: ^MEN-: 1 attack. 2 go through, endure. KE--AN: 1 be responsible for. 2 to be blamed for s.t. -AN: an attack.
example: Akhirnya aku juga yang KETEMPUHAN karena ulahmu.

definition: combat. BER-: to fight. PER--AN: battle. Also MEN-, MEMPER--KAN, PEN-.
long_definition: ^combat. *BER-: be engaged in combat. MEN-: attack, assail. MEMPER--KAN: 1 fight for s.t. 2 cause s.o. to fight (on behalf of another). PEN-: assailant. *PER--AN: battle, combat.
example: PERTEMPURAN di Surabaya di tahun 1945 sangat hebat.

long_definition: coconut shell.
vernacular_definition: Bagian kulit yang keras dari buah kelapa, kulit ini berserabut dan biasanya berwarna coklat muda.

definition: meet, come together. BER-: to meet s.o. Also MEN--I, MEN--KAN, KE-, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^meet, come together. *BER-: to meet s.o. *MEN--I: 1 to go to meet with s.o. 2 to happen upon. 3 to experience. *MEN--KAN: to find, meet with, discover. *KE-: 1 to accidentally meet, happen to meet. 2 to be discovered. *PER--AN: meeting. *DI--I: met with.
example: PERTEMUAN antara ibu dan anak itu sangat mengharukan.

definition: energy, power. BER-: to have power or energy.
long_definition: energy, power. BER-: to have power or energy.
example: Sesudah makan saya merasa BERTENAGA lagi.

long_definition: workforce

definition: calm, quiet, peaceful. MEN--KAN: to calm s.t. or s.o. down. Also KE--AN.
long_definition: calm, quiet, peaceful. *MEN--KAN: to calm s.t. or s.o. down. *KE--AN: peacefulness, quietness.
vernacular_definition: Tidak bergerak; kalem; sepi yang mengandung kedamaian.
example: KETENANGAN suasana ini dirusak oleh kemunculannya.

long_definition: tent, awning
example: Untuk pesta perkawinan anaknya, Pak Hasan memasang TENDA di depan rumah

definition: 1. kick with the side of the foot. 2. expel s.o. Also MEN-, -AN, TER--.
long_definition: 1. kick with the side of one's foot. 2. expel s.o. MEN-: to kick with the side of one's foot. -AN: a kick. TER--: kicked.
example: Ia TERTENDANG dari team olimpiade.

definition: middle, center; the midst of. SE-: half. MEN--I: to intervene. Also MEN--KAN, +
long_definition: ^1 middle, center. 2 the midst of. *SE-: half. *MEN--I: to intervene. *MEN--KAN: to come in between. *PER--AN: middle. *PEN--: mediator.
example: Candi ini dibangun pada abad PERTENGAHAN.

long_definition: sign, signal * ME~I = suspect
example: * Pak guru MENENGARAI Andi meniru dalam ujian

long_definition: restrain *-RASA = considerate, thoughtful, show repectful restrain
example: Hidup bertetangga harus mempunyai TENGGANG RASA yang kuat

long_definition: southeast.

definition: to sink, become submerged. MEN--KAN: to sink s.t.
long_definition: ^ to sink, become submerged. MEN--KAN: to sink s.t.
vernacular_definition: Masuk ke dalam benda cair; karam; hilang tidak ada beritanya lagi.
example: Torpedo itu MENENGGELAMKAN kapal perang musuh.

long_definition: Spanish mackerel
example: Pergilah ke pasar dan belikan Ibu ikan TENGGIRI

long_definition: see TENGGOROKAN
[Anat.] throat, larynx
example: Sepanjang malam Ani merasa kesakitan di TENGGOROKANnya

definition: dispute, argue. BER-(-AN): to quarrel, argue. Also MEMPER--KAN, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^dispute, argue. *BER-(-AN): to quarrel, argue. *MEMPER--KAN: to make s.t. the object of dispute. *PER--AN: a dispute, a fracas.
example: Sulit sekali dilerai PERTENGKARAN kalian.

long_definition: tank (for containing a substance).
skull, cranium.
example: Badannya tinggal tulang dan TENGKORAK saja.

definition: the nape of the neck; a bunch of bananas.
long_definition: 1 the nape of the neck. 2 a bunch of bananas.

definition: BER-, MEN-: to lie face down.
long_definition: BER-, MEN-: to lie face down.
vernacular_definition: Tidur dengan perut di bagian bawah; telungkup; tiarap.
example: Kami MENENGKURAP ketika musuh lewat.

definition: MEN-: to look; to look in on, to pay a visit to.
long_definition: MEN-: 1 to look. 2 to look in on, to pay a visit to.
example: Saya akan MENENGOK bayi temanku yang baru lahir.

definition: place opposite of; about, concerning. Also BER--AN, MEN-, -AN, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^1 place opposite of. 2 about, concerning. *BER--AN: to be opposing e.o., to be in conflict, be at odds. *MEN-: 1 to gaze at. 2 to oppose. 3 to face. *-AN: opposition. *PER--AN: a conflict or controversy.
example: Ini adalah PERTENTANGAN pribadi jangan turut campur.

definition: army. KE--AN: 1. military. 2. military forces. PE(R-)-AN: army base.
long_definition: ^army. KE--AN: 1. military. 2. military forces. PE(R-)-AN: 1. military barracks. 2. army base.
*MEN-KAN = pacify, reassure, calm *KE-AN = calm, tranquility
example: Hidup di desa memberikan KETENTERAMAN yang saya inginkan

definition: fixed, definite, certain. MEN-: certain, stable, unchanging. Also MEN--KAN, +
long_definition: ^fixed, definite, certain. *MEN-: certain, stable, unchanging. *MEN--KAN: determine, make certain of. *TER-: certain, specified, known (but not named). *KE--AN: certainty, stipulation.
example: KETENTUAN ini sudah baku tidak bisa diubah lagi.

definition: theory. BER-: theorize. MENT--KAN: theorize about s.t.
long_definition: theory. BER-: theorize. MENT--KAN: theorize about s.t.

definition: exact, precise, on the mark. MEN-: go straight. Also MEN--KAN, -AN.
long_definition: ^exact, precise, on the mark. *MEN-: go straight. *MEN--KAN: aim, direct, guide, set (a watch). -AN: destination, goal, purpose.
vernacular_definition: Tidak kurang dan tidak lebih; pas; cocok.
example: Ayah sedang MENEPATKAN jam tangannya.

definition: side, edge, periphery. BER-: be boardered by s.t. Also BER--KAN, MEN-,+
long_definition: ^side, edge, periphery. BER-: be boardered by s.t. BER--KAN: have s.t. along the edge. MEN-: 1. move to o. side. 2. go along the side (of road). MEN--KAN: move s.t to o. side. MENGE--KAN: 1. place s.t. at the side. 2. ignore, neglect. -AN: 1. edge, boarder, hem. 2. bathing place by the river side.

definition: light tap or blow. BER-: to tap or clap (as with hands). Also MEN-, MEN--KAN, +
long_definition: ^light tap or blow. *BER-: to tap or clap (as of the hands). *MEN-: clap, slap. *MEN-KAN: hit or slap with s.t. *-AN: clapping, applause.
vernacular_definition: Mengadu kedua tangan sehingga terdengar bunyi; memukul dengan perlahan.
example: TEPUKANnya bisa keras sekali.

long_definition: flour.  Tepung Sagu = Sago powder
vernacular_definition: Benda halus/lembut seperti bubuk yang dibuat dari umbi, buah, bunga, dll.
example: TEPUNG ini diperlukan untuk membuat kue serabi

long_definition: official seal MEN-: seal something TER-: officially stamped, printed
latticework, bars (of window), trellis
example: Pencuri itu berhasil merusak TERALI jendela kami dan masuk ke dalam rumah

long_definition: see TRAMPIL

definition: clear, bright, obvious. MEN--I: shed light on s.t. Also MEN--KAN, KE--AN, +
long_definition: ^clear, bright, obvious. *MEN--I: shed light on s.t. *MEN--KAN: to clarify, to explain s.t. *KE--AN: explanation, information. *PEN--AN: explanation, clarification, illumination.
example: PENERANGAN di desaku masih belum cukup.

long_definition: arranging, applying. MEN--KAN: apply. PEN--AN: application *DI--KAN: applied.
example: PENERAPAN Pancasila sangat penting dalam kehidupan bermasyarakat.

definition: 1.[Biol.] hard core of certain tree; 2. essence, nucleus;3. principal element, elite; 4. porch, terrace
long_definition: hard core of certain tree; essence, nucleus *principal element *porch, terrace *PEJABAT-- : key officials *BER-- : have a porch or terrace
vernacular_definition: inti batang pohon; halaman depan rumah
example: Saya sangat suka dengan rumah yang BERTERAS luas

definition: salted, fermented fish or shrimp paste.
long_definition: salted, fermented fish or shrimp paste.
vernacular_definition: Bahan makanan/bumbu yang dibuat dari ikan atau udang.
example: Sangat nikmat memakan sambal TERASI dengan ikan goreng

long_definition: k.o. lotus.

definition: to fly. BER--AN: to fly (of many things). Also MEN--KAN, PEN-.
long_definition: to fly. *BER--AN: to fly (of many things). *MEN--KAN: cause s.t. to fly. *PEN-: pilot, aviator.
example: Adikku selalu bercita-cita menjadi PENERBANG.

definition: rise, emerge, appear, print, publish. Also MEN--KAN, -AN, PEN-.
long_definition: ^rise, emerge, appear, print, publish. *MEN--KAN: to cause, produce, or publish s.t. *-AN: publication. *PEN-: publisher.
example: Saya tidak pasti siapa PENERBIT buku ini.

definition: scream, yell, shout. BER-: to scream, yell, or shut. Also -AN.
long_definition: scream, yell, shout. *BER-: to scream, yell, or shout. *-AN: a scream, a yell, a shout.
example: Terdengar TERIAKAN yang mengerikan malam itu.

long_definition: wheat.
example: Tepung TERIGU adalah salah satu jenis tepung yang dipergunakan sebagai bahan dasar kue-kue

definition: extreme, intense (usually in reference to heat). Also MEN--KAN.
long_definition: extreme, intense (usually in reference to heat). *MEN--KAN: to intensify.
example: Sinar matahari siang ini tambah MENERIKKAN suasana.

definition: receive, accept. MEN-: to receive or accept s.t. Also PEN-, PEN--AN.
long_definition: receive, accept. *MEN-: to receive or accept s.t. *PEN-: one who receives, a receiver. *PEN--AN: acceptance, reception.
example: PENERIMAAN mereka terhadap kami baik-baik saja.

long_definition: kick, trample. SEPAK TERJANG = behavior.
example: SEPAK TERJANG orang itu tidak dapat dimaafkan.

definition: MENT--KAN: to translate s.t. -AN: a translation.
long_definition: MEN--KAN: to translate s.t. -AN: a translation.
vernacular_definition: Mengalihbahasakan; mengartikan suatu bahasa ke bahasa yang lain.
example: Ini TERJEMAHAN bahasa Indonesia dari buku itu.

definition: to fall or jump down. MEN--I: jump into. Also MEN--KAN, PEN-, PEN--AN.
long_definition: to fall or jump down. MEN--I: jump into. MEN--KAN: cause s.t. to fall downward. PEN-: jumper. PEN--AN: jumping.
vernacular_definition: Melompat turun ke dalam sesuatu hal.
example: Bapakku PENERJUN parasut yang ulung.

long_definition: see LALU.
terminal.

definition: livestock. BE(R)-: breed. MEN(T)--KAN: breed animals. PE-: breeder. Also PE--AN.
long_definition: livestock. BE(R)-: breed. MEN(T)--KAN: breed animals. PE-: breeder. PE--AN: animal husbandry.
see TERUNG
1. telescope, binoculars; 2. tube *MEN--: 1. look through a telescope; 2. observe carefully, study, scrutinize
example: Penelitian ini MENEROPONG kehidupan suku terasing

long_definition: tunnel
example: Kereta api masuk ke dalam TEROWONGAN panjang dan gelap

long_definition: terpaulin, canvas

definition: in order, behaving correctly so that disorder is avoided.
long_definition: in order, behaving correctly so that disorder is avoided. *MEN--KAN: straighten up, put in order, control, curb. *KE--AN: orderliness, law and order. *PEN--AN: control, curb. *DI--KAN: to be controlled, to make s.t. orderly.
example: Lalu lintas harus DITERTIBKAN agar jalan tidak macet

long_definition: egg plant see also TERONG
example: Masakan Turki kebanyakan menggunakan TERUNG

definition: straight ahead, straight away, directly. Also SE--AN, BER--AN, MEN--KAN, -AN.
long_definition: ^straight ahead, straight away, directly. *SE--NYA: henceforth. BER--AN: continuously. *MEN--KAN: to make s.t. continue, to proceed further with s.t. *-AN: continuation, sequel.
vernacular_definition: Lurus menuju suatu tempat; tidak berhenti; tetap berlangsung.
example: TERUSAN filem ini pasti akan menarik sekali.

long_definition: continuously.

definition: 1.superior, best; 2. especially; 3. most important; see also UTAMA
long_definition: 1.superior, best; 2. especially; 3. most important; see also UTAMA
example: Dari semua murid di sekolah, Aminah yang TERUTAMA

long_definition: test, exam.
test, examine testing : examination

definition: neighbor. BER-: to have neighbors, to be neighbors with.
long_definition: neighbor. *BER-: to have neighbors, to be neighbors with.
vernacular_definition: Orang yang tinggal di sebelah kita.
example: Kehidupan BERTETANGGA di kampung ini sangat tenteram.

definition: permanent, unchanging. Also MEN-, MEN--KAN, KE--AN.
long_definition: ^permanent, unchanging. *MEN-: 1 reside permanently. 2 to become stablized. *MEN--KAN: to determine, settle upon, establish make stable. *KE--AN: decision, determination, constancy.
example: KETETAPAN yang sudah digariskan organisasi tak bisa diubah lagi.

long_definition: but.
teat. MEN--I: breast-feed.
example: Tante Anik sedang MENETEKI bayinya.

long_definition: red tape, fuss over trifles.
vernacular_definition: segala macam; yang kecil-kecil dan kurang penting.
example: Urusan TETEK BENGEK ini sungguh merepotkanku.

definition: drip. MEN-: to drip. MEN--I: to drip onto s.t. Also MEN--KAN, -AN.
long_definition: drip. *MEN-: to drip. *MEN--I: to drip onto s.t. *MEN--KAN: to make s.t. fall by drips. *-AN: a drop.
vernacular_definition: Benda cair yang jatuh setitik demi setitik.
example: Lumayan juga saya dapat TETESAN rejeki darinya.

long_definition: die, be slain. MEN--KAN: kill.
example: Tabrakan besar itu MENEWASKAN hampir seratus orang.

long_definition: contraction of "tidak ada."

definition: pole, post, mast. BER-: propped up, supported. MEN--I: provide with poles.
long_definition: pole, post, mast. BER-: propped up, supported. MEN--I: provide with poles, posts.
*SE-: every, each.
example: SETIAP anak diharapkan membawa bukunya masing-masing.

definition: arrive. TIBA-TIBA: suddenly, unexpectedly. SE-: upon arrival.
long_definition: ^arrive. *TIBA-TIBA: suddenly, unexpectedly. *SE-: upon arrival.
example: Kami langsung berkemas lagi SETIBA di kota itu.

definition: no, not. SE-_-_-NYA: at the least, in any case. Also MEN--KAN, MEMPER--KAN.
long_definition: ^no, not. *SE-_-_-NYA: at the least, in any case. *MEN--KAN, MEMPER-KAN: deny.
vernacular_definition: Partikel untuk menyatakan suatu penolakan; penyangkalan; pengingkaran.
example: Sulit MENIDAKKAN permintaannya.

definition: sleep. Also MEN--I, MEN--KAN, TER-, KE--AN.
long_definition: ^sleep. *MEN--I: 1 lie down on or sleep on s.t. 2 (of a man) to have sexual intercourse with s.o. *MEN--KAN: to lay s.t. down or put s.o. to bed. *TER-: to fall asleep. *KE--AN: 1 to be overtaken by sleep. 2 to oversleep.
vernacular_definition: Keadaan dimana seseorang sedang mengistirahatkan badan dan kesadarannya.
example: Saya sempat KETIDURAN ketika menunggu kereta api datang.

definition: three. BER-: do s.t. in group of three. Also KE-, KE-_-_-NYA, PER-, PER--AN, +
long_definition: ^three. *BER-: do s.t. in group of three. *KE-: 1 third. 2 all three. *KE-_-_-NYA: all three. *PER-: a third. *PER--AN: a three-way intersection. SEPER-: one third. KE--AN: (Rel.) trinity.
example: Di PERTIGAAN itu ada upacara selamatan.

long_definition: see TITIK.
a woven floor/sleeping mat.
vernacular_definition: alas; anyaman daun pandan yang dipakai untuk lapisan duduk/tidur.

long_definition: ticket.
vernacular_definition: Kartu tanda untuk ijin masuk suatu tempat/pertunjukan.

long_definition: rat, mouse

definition: something to sleep on (mat, blanket, mattress)
long_definition: *BER- = have something to sleep on
example: Semalam saya tidur hanya BERTILAM sarung

long_definition: traffic ticket MEN-- : issue a traffic ticket
example: Polisi MENILANG pengemudi mobil merah itu

long_definition: see TILAWAT
[Isl.] recitation of the Koran. *SARI--: recitation and translation of the Koran.
telegram. MEN-: send a telegram.

definition: look at s.t to see how it is, inspect. ME-: to inspect.
long_definition: look at s.t. to see how it is, inspect. ME-: to inspect.
example: Ayahnya adalah PENILIK sekolah.

definition: Taman Ismail Marzuki, a complex in Jakarta containing museums and theaters.
long_definition: Taman Ismail Marzuki, a complex in Jakarta containing museums and theaters.

definition: see TIM1 (k.o. soup) or TIM2 (team). TIM3 (Taman Ismail Marzuki).
long_definition: see TIM1 (k.o. soup). TIM2 (team). TIM3 (Taman Ismail Marzuki).
a k.o. soup.
vernacular_definition: Sebangsa bubur yang berbumbu atau bersayur.

long_definition: team (sports, etc.).
*--HITAM: lead *--PUTIH: tin
example: Daerah ini terkenal sebagai penghasil TIMAH terbesar

definition: MEN--: rock (a child) in o's arms or a cradle
long_definition: MEN--: rock (a child) in o's arms or a cradle
example: Ibu bernyanyi kecil sambil MENIMANG bayinya

long_definition: pail, bucket.
vernacular_definition: Benda yang digunakan untuk mengambil air dari sumur atau sungai.

long_definition: balancing. *--BALIK: on both sides *BER--BALIK: be on both sides, mutual. *SE--: in balance, proportionate, equitable, just.
example: Dia mendapatkan hukuman yang SETIMBAL

definition: MEN-: take the weight of s.t., take s.t. into account. Also MEMPER--KAN, +
long_definition: MEN-: take the weight of s.t., take s.t. into account. MEMPER--KAN: consider s.t. carefully. PER--AN: consideration, judgement.
example: Segala PERTIMBANGAN sudah kudengar.

definition: emerge, appear. MEN--KAN: make s.t. appear or come to the surface.
long_definition: ^emerge, appear. *MEN--KAN: make s.t. appear or come to the surface, to release (a movie, album, etc.).
example: Sutradara itu akan MEMUNCULKAN lakon Mahabarata lagi.

long_definition: heap, pile *BER--: in piles *BER--(2): piled up *MEN--: be heaped up, becomes piles; heap s.t. up *MEN--I: heap piles on s.t. *TER--: heaped up; burried under, covered with *--AN: a pile, heap *PEN--AN: accummulation, piling up; hoarding; process of reclaiming land from the sea by piling up earth.
example: Daerah ini akan menjadi tempat PENIMBUNAN sampah

long_definition: see TIMOR TIMUR.

definition: the Province of East Timor in Indonesia. Its capital city is Dili.
long_definition: the Province of East Tmor in Indonesia. Its capital city is Dili.

definition: MEN-(-I): fall on, descend upon. TER-: struck down.
long_definition: MEN-(-I): fall on, descend upon. TER-: struck down.
example: Sudah jatuh TERTIMPA tangga pula (peribahasa).

long_definition: see TIMBAL
* (Jkt.) MEN~(I), N~IN = throw at MEN~KAN = throw s.t. ~AN = a throw
example: * Susi DITIMPUKI segelas air oleh adiknya

long_definition: contraction for "Timur Tengah," or the Middle East.

definition: "Timur Timur," or the province of East Timur.
long_definition: contraction for "Timur Timur," or the province of East Timur.
see KETIMUN.
east.
vernacular_definition: Lawannya barat; arah yang menunjukkan suatu tujuan.

definition: BER-: take steps, measures, to act. Also MEN-, MEN--KAN, -AN.
long_definition: ^action, act. BER-: take steps, measures, to act. MEN-: to take action against. MEN--KAN: carry out an action. -AN: an action, measure to be implimented. PEN--AN: taking measures. *--LANJUT: follow-up.
example: TINDAKANnya sangat tidak bertanggungjawab.

definition: MEN-: crush; oppress, suppress, weigh down. Also TER-, -AN, +
long_definition: ^*MEN-: 1 crush. 2 oppress, suppress, weigh down. *TER-: 1 crushed. 2 oppressed, suppressed. *-AN: oppression, confining grip or hold. PEN-: oppressor. *PEN--AN: oppression.
example: Bekerja terlalu keras begini sama saja dengan PENINDASAN.

definition: oppose by pushing down from above.
long_definition: oppose by pushing down from above. *TUMPANG--: overlap.
example: TINDIHLAH kerta-kertas itu dengan batu ini supaya tidak terbang.

definition: live, reside; remain, stay. MEN-: to die. Also MEN--KAN, TER-, KE--AN, -AN.
long_definition: 1 live, reside. 2 remain, stay. *MEN-: to die. *MEN--KAN: to leave (s.t. behind). *TER-: be left behind. *KE--AN: accidentally left out or left behind. -AN: remainder, inheritance.
vernacular_definition: diam; tidak melakukan apa-apa; menempati; sudah lampau.
example: Wah gawat kita sudah KETINGGALAN kereta api.

definition: 1. hight, tall. 2. advanced. Also SE-, SE--NYA, MEN-, MEN--KAN, MEMPER-(-KAN).
long_definition: ^1. high, tall. 2. advanced. SE-: no matter how high. SE--NYA: the highest possible. MEN-: go up, rise, MEN--KAN: raise, increase, enhance. MEMPER-(-KAN): make s.t. higher. KE--AN: height. PE-: s.o. with formal authority in a region. PEN--AN: raising, enhancement.
1. action. 2. overaction.
example: Selama ini TINGKAHnya sangat menyebalkanku.

definition: 1. floor. 2. rung. 3. level. 4. phase. BER-: multi-leveled. MEN-: raise.+
long_definition: ^1. floor, story. 2. rung. 3. level degree. 4. phase, stage. BER-: multistoried, multi-leveled. MEN-: increase, rise. MEN--KAN: 1. raise s.t. 2. upgrade. *PEN--AN: increase, raise. -AN: floor, level, stage.
feces.

definition: observe, look at with consideration. ME-: to observe.
long_definition: observe, look at with consideration. ME-: to observe. *DI--: viewed, observed, considered.
example: Banyak pejabat dari pusat datang MENINJAU daerah yang terkena banjir itu.

long_definition: fist. BER-: boxing.
vernacular_definition: Kepalan tangan; memukul dengan kepalan tangan.
example: BERTINJU adalah olah raga kegemaran suamiku.

long_definition: ink
type.

definition: 1. thin, slight. 2. fine. MEN-: 1. become thin. 2. diminish. Also MEN--KAN.
long_definition: ^1. thin, slight. 2. fine (of thread). MEN-: 1. become thin. 2. diminish, become less and less. MEN--KAN: 1. make s.t. thin. 2. delute s.t. 3. reduce, decrease.
*MEN- : deceit s.o. *TER- : cheated, tricked -AN : deceit, swindle PE-AN : deception
example: Kami semua TERTIPU oleh tukang sulap jalanan itu

long_definition: (holy) water.
imitate. -AN: imitation. *ME- = duplicate.
vernacular_definition: Melakukan sesuatu menurut hal yang sudah ada sebelumnya atau sudah dilakukan orang lain; contoh; teladan.
example: Barang TIRUAN ini kualitasnya sangat jelek.

long_definition: *MEN-(-I): darn, mend.
example: Minah is MENDING it.

definition: drop; (Gram.) period. BER-: to drip; to have a period. -AN: a drop.
long_definition: 1 drop. 2 (Gram.) period. *BER-: 1 to drip. 2 to have a period. *-AN: a drop.
example: TITIKAN yang kau buat kurang jelas.

definition: MEN-, MEN--KAN: entrust s.t. to s.o.'s care. Also MEN--I, KE--AN, +
long_definition: ^*MEN-, MEN--KAN: entrust s.t. to s.o.'s care. *MEN--I: entrust to s.o.'s care. *KE--AN: 1 to have s.t. entrusted to o.'s care. 2 the act of keeping s.t. in trust, watching over. *-AN: s.t. entrusted to another's care.
vernacular_definition: Memberikan sesuatu pada seseorang untuk disampaikan pada orang lain.
example: Apakah TITIPANku sudah sampai?

definition: blow. BER-: blow. Also MEN-, MEN--I, MEN--KAN, -AN, PEN-.
long_definition: ^blow (of wind), related to wind instruments. BER-: blow. MEN-: 1. blow. 2. blow a problem out of proportion. MEN--I: blow onto s.t. MEN--KAN: cause to spread. -AN: blast of wind. PEN-: person who blows.
(Taman Kanak-Kanak) kindergarten.

definition: abbreviation for Tenaga Kerja Indonesia = Indonesia Working Force; refers to Indonesians working abroad.
long_definition: abbreviation for Tenaga Kerja Indonesia = Indonesia Working Force; refers to Indonesians working abroad.
example: Tahun ini jumlah TKI di Malaysia semakin meningkat

long_definition: (Tentara Nasional Indonesia) National Armed Forces of Indonesia.

definition: threaten someone by pointing a weapon
long_definition: *TUKANG- = armed robber *MEN- = threaten someone by pointing a weapon *MEN-KAN = threaten by pointing with something *-AN = threat consisting of something pointed *PE(N)- = hold-up man
example: Sambil berteriak, Amir MENODONG Hamsah dengan pisau dapur

long_definition: nevertheless, after all.
*store, shop.
vernacular_definition: Tempat dimana terdapat banyak barang yang dijual.
example: TOKO yang besar itu disebut supermarket.

definition: shape, form; personage, character in a story.
long_definition: ^1 shape, form. 2 personage, character in a story.
vernacular_definition: figur; orang yang menjadi bintang cerita; bentuk/potongan.
example: Dialah TOKOH utama dalam filem itu.

definition: MEN-: to refuse, reject, push away. -AN: a push. PEN--AN: refusal, rejection.
long_definition: ^MEN-: to refuse, reject, push away. -AN: a push. PEN--AN: refusal, rejection.
vernacular_definition: Dorong; tidak menerima suatu pemberian kemudian mengembalikannya.
example: TOLAKANMU kurang kuat.

long_definition: stupid, dim-witted.
example: Itu adalah perbuatan TOLOL!

definition: help; please. MEN-: to give help or assistance. Also TER-, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^1 help. 2 please. *MEN-: to give help or assistance. *TER-: helped, capable of being helped. *PER--AN: help, aid, assistance.
example: Sayang PERTOLONGANnya datang terlambat jadi dia keburu meninggal.

long_definition: *tomato.
example: TOMAT yang baru dipetik ini kelihatan ranum-ranum.

long_definition: spear.
knob or button.
ton.
example: BerTON-TON beras hilang dari gudang itu.

long_definition: *barrel, cask.
vernacular_definition: Wadah yang berbentuk bulat biasanya terbuat dari aluminium atau kayu.
example: Apakah TONG sampahnya sudah kau keluarkan?

long_definition: *BER- = use as a cane
example: Orang tua itu berjalan memakai TONGKAT

definition: 1. nudge with extended finger, shove with a blunt object. 2. (fig.) cause.
long_definition: 1. nudge with extended finger, shove with a blunt object. 2. (fig.) cause.
example: Dia marah besar ketika mukanya DITONJOK orang itu.

definition: a bulge. MEN-: bulge, stick out. MEN--KAN: cause to stick out, show.
long_definition: a bulge. MEN-: bulge, stick out. MEN--KAN: cause to stick out, show.
example: Setiap kali berbicara dia selalu MENONJOLKAN dirinya sendiri.

definition: ME(N)-: watch (a movie, etc.), observe. -AN: a performance. PEN-: spectator.
long_definition: ^*ME(N)-: watch (a movie, etc.), observe. *-AN: a performance. *PEN-: spectator, audience.
example: Kami kurang pasti berapa banyak PENONTONnya.

long_definition: *BER-- : lean on, be supported on *MEN-- : prop up, shore up *PEN-- : support, prop
example: PENOPANG papan itu sudah rapuh

long_definition: *BER- = have or wear a mask; cover up *BER-KAN = use something as a cover up
example: Perampok BERTOPENG yang mencuri mobil itu ternyata anak Pak Amir

long_definition: hat, cap.

definition: an ethnic group in the interior of South Celebes.
long_definition: an ethnic group living in the interior of South Celebes.
vernacular_definition: Nama sebuah suku yang bermukim di Sulawesi Selatan.

definition: MEN--: make a shallow cut; slit open
long_definition: MEN--: make a shallow cut; slit open *--AN: a notch, incision, slit *PEN--: scoring or slitting tool
example: Luka di kakinya hanya TOREHAN kecil saja

long_definition: *tradition.
example: TRADISI ini sudah berlangsung berabad-abad lamanya.

long_definition: traditional.
treaty
example: Dengan TRAKTAT itu, ke dua negara akhirnya berhenti berperang

definition: MEN-: treat s.o. to s.t. -AN: the treating of s.o. to s.t.
long_definition: *MEN-: treat s.o. to s.t. *-AN: the treating of s.o. to s.t.
example: Di balik TRAKTIRANnya begini ada maksud-maksud tertentu.

definition: skilled, competent. MEN--KAN: train s.o. KE--AN: skill, know-how.
long_definition: skilled, competent. MEN--KAN: train s.o. KE--AN: skill, know-how.
transport
quintillion
tropical.
sidewalk.
vernacular_definition: Kaki lima; jalanan kecil bagi pejalan kaki di pinggir jalan kendaraan umum.
example: Dilarang naik sepeda di TROTOAR ini!

long_definition: truck.

definition: old; ripe; dark (of a color). MEN-: to become old, dark, or ripe. Also KE-, +
long_definition: ^1 old. 2 ripe. 3 dark (of a color). *MEN-: to become old, dark, or ripe. KE-: see KETUA. *KE--AN: 1 age. 2 to be too old.
example: Dia sudah KETUAAN untuk menjadi pemula.

definition: fly around constantly (as of bees); be without permanent residence. Also BER-.
long_definition: ^1 fly around constantly (as of bees, flies, etc.). 2 to be without a permanent residence. BER-: 1 swarm (of insects). 2 to wander about aimlessly.
example: Dia suka BERTUALANG karena masih muda.

definition: respectful term of address or title for a man.
long_definition: *respectful term of address or title for a man. *--RUMAH: host or hostess.
vernacular_definition: Sebutan untuk laki-laki yang dianggap berderajat tinggi/terhormat.
example: Diharapkan TUAN BESAR akan mengampuni kesalahanmu.

definition: pour. MEN--KAN: pour s.t. TER-: poured (accidentally), poured forth. Also -AN.
long_definition: pour. *MEN--KAN: pour s.t. *TER-: poured (accidentally), poured forth. -AN: s.t. poured or to be poured.
example: Semua aturan itu TERTUANG di kitab undang-undang.

long_definition: BER[--2] : doing the same thing over and over again; repetition
vernacular_definition: melakukan sesuatu secara berulang; terus-menerus; berkali-kali
example: Ali sangat marah dan memukul meja BERTUBI-TUBI

definition: lunge, collide with, slam against. BER--AN: to have a collision. Also MEN-, +
long_definition: ^lunge, collide with, slam against. BER--AN: to have a collision. MEN-: to lunge at or collide with s.t. TER-: slammed into. -AN: a collision.
vernacular_definition: Lompatan hendak menerkam; langgar; tabrak; dll.
example: TUBRUKAN itu terjadi pengendaranya mabuk.

definition: tubuh. MEN--KAN: actualize, realize. SE-: copulation. Also BERSE-, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^body. MEN--KAN: actualize, realize. *SE-: copulation. *BERSE-: to engage in sexual intercourse. *PERSE--AN: sexual intercourse.
example: PERSETUBUHAN sebelum menikah sangat dilarang oleh agama.

long_definition: tuding1 sloping, at an angle MEN~KAN = make s.t. slant tuding2 (Jv) index finger * MEN~ = 1. point at s.t. 2. accuse MEN~I = point at s.t. repeatedly MEN~KAN = point with s.t. ~AN = 1. s.t. which is pointed at 2. accusation
example: * Andi MENUDING lubang tikus di dapur

definition: accuse, accusation. MEN-: accuse s.o. -AN: accusation. Also PEN-, PEN--AN.
long_definition: accuse, accusation. MEN-: accuse s.o. -AN: accusation. PEN-: plaintiff. PEN--AN: accusation.
vernacular_definition: Menunjuk dan mengatakan seseorang/sekelompok orang telah berbuat tidak baik/melanggar hukum. =
example: Ini baru TUDUHAN pembunuhan tingkat

long_definition: veil, cover; sun hat *BER--: be covered; use a veil *BER--KAN: covered with *MEN--I: cover s.t. up carefully *TER--: covered
example: Pohon ini MENUDUNGI halaman rumah kami

definition: duty, assignment, task. BER-: to have a duty or task. Also MEN--I, MEN--KAN, +
long_definition: ^duty, assignment, task. *BER-: to have a duty or task. *MEN--I: give an assignment or task. *MEN--KAN: give s.t. as an assignment or task. *PE-: en employee, functionary.
example: Orang yang berseragam abu-abu itu PETUGAS pajak.

long_definition: *-- PERINGATAN: memorial, monument
example: Di sini terdapat TUGU PERINGATAN pahlawan perang

definition: God. BER-: to have as God. KE--AN: divinity. _-_-AN: a false god.
long_definition: God. *BER-: to have as God. *KE--AN: divinity. *_-_-AN: a false god.
vernacular_definition: Allah; makhluk yang Maha Kuasa dan Esa.
example: Sandiwara itu juga menampilkan adegan TUHAN-TUHANAN.

definition: SE-, BERSE-: agree. MENY--I: agree to s.t. Also MEN-, MEN--KAN, -AN, +
long_definition: ^*SE-, BERSE-: agree. *MENY--I: agree to s.t. MEN-: go in a certain direction, aim for. MEN--KAN: 1 point with s.t. 2 cause s.t. to point in a certain direction. *-AN: aim, desire, objective, destination, purpose. *PERSE--AN: agreement, treaty, understanding.
example: PERSETUJUAN ini kami adakan dengan sukarela.

definition: seven. BER-: do in a group of seven. Also KE-, KE-_-_-NYA.
long_definition: seven. *BER-: do in a group of seven. *KE-:1 seventh. 2 all seven. KE-_-_-NYA: all seven (of a group).
example: Dia anak yang KETUJUH di keluarganya.

definition: skilled laborer, craftsman. KE--AN: craftsmanship. Also PER--AN.
long_definition: ^skilled laborer, craftsman. KE--AN: craftsmanship. *PER--AN: 1 craftsmanship. 2 guild, association of craftspersons.
vernacular_definition: Orang yang bekerja untuk orang lain dengan gaji, biasanya pekerjaan kasar.
example: Sekolah itu juga mengajarkan ketrampilan PERTUKANGAN.

long_definition: *BER--: change **BER--2: 1. alternating 2. keep changing BER--(2)AN: mutually exchange. MEN--: 1. change 2. exchange, barter. MEN--KAN: give s.t ***MEMPER--KAN: 1. barter 2. vary TER--: get accidently exchanged PEN--: changer PEN--AN: 1. alteration, process of making a change 2. exchange PER--AN: 1. exchange 2. change
example: ***Orang Kubu dan pedagang MEPERTUKARKAN hasil bumi dengan barang dagangan

long_definition: *BER- = bony
example: Ikan ini sangat BERTULANG

long_definition: *MEN--: 1. infect, contaminate. 2.spread. *MEN--I: spread to s.o. or s.t., contaminate. *MEN--KAN: cause s.t. to spread. *KE--AN: infected, contaminated. *--AN: 1. contagion. *PEN--AN: spreading. *PEN--: infector, infecting agent.
example: PENULARAN penyakit demam berdarah harus dihentikan

definition: write. MEN-: to write. MEN--KAN: write s.t. down. Also TER-, -AN, PEN-.
long_definition: ^write. *MEN-: to write. *MEN--KAN: write s.t. down. *TER-: written. *-AN: s.t. written, a writing. *PEN-: a writer.
example: Dia memang salah seorang PENULIS yang terkenal.

definition: honest, candid, sincere. KE--AN: honesty, sincerity.
long_definition: honest, candid, sincere. KE--AN: honesty, sincerity.
vernacular_definition: Ikhlas; jujur; tidak pura-pura; keluar dari hati yang suci; dll.
example: KETULUSAN hatinya menolongku sungguh membuatku terharu.

definition: grow, sprout up, arise from below. BER-: to grow. Also MEN--KAN, KE--AN, +
long_definition: ^grow, sprout up, arise from below. BER-: to grow. *MEN--KAN: to make s.t. grow. KE--AN: 1 growth. 2 skin eruption. 3 grown over. *-AN: a plant, plant growth. PER--AN: growth, development.
example: Tanaman ini termasuk jenis TUMBUHAN yang berbiji tunggal.

definition: pound. BER-: hit, coincide. Also BER--AN; MEN-, MEN--KAN, TER-, -AN.
long_definition: ^pound. BER-: hit, coincide. *BER--AN: collide with e.o., hit against e.o. *MEN-: pound, crush, hit, crash into. *MEN--KAN: hit or pound with s.t. TER-: 1 inadvertently made to collide with s.t. 2 hit, crushed. -AN: 1 a blow or pounding. 2 s.t. pounded or crushed.
example: Orang gila itu suka MENUMBUK-NUMBUKKAN kepalanya ke dinding.

definition: a culinary procedure similar to sauteing but a higher temperature; stir-fry
long_definition: a culinary procedure similar to sauteing but a higher temperature; stir-fry *MEN--: saute at high temperatures; stir-fry
example: Ibu memasak sayur dan MENUMIS daging di dapur

long_definition: heel - sepatu : shoe heel
example: Sepatu barunya membuat TUMIT Sinta sakit

definition: spilled. MEN--I: spill on s.t. Also MEN--KAN, TER-, KE--AN, -AN.
long_definition: ^spilled. MEN--I: spill on s.t. MEN--KAN: 1. cause s.t. to spill. 2. spill s.t. out. TER-: 1. spilled. 2. be concentrated on. KE--AN: have s.t. spilled on. -AN: 1. s.t. spilled. 2. concentration (of effort).

definition: join with others. BER-: overlap, be piled on top of o. another. Also (ME)N-, +
long_definition: ^join with others. BER-: overlap, be piled up on top of o. another. *(ME)N-: 1 catch a ride in, go by. 2 join in with, go along with. 3 stay with. ME--I: ride in. TER-: included. *-AN: 1 lodging. 2 fare, passenger. *PEN-: passenger. PEN--AN: lodging house. *--TINDIH: overlap.
example: Sepagi ini saya tidak mendapatkan seorang PENUMPANGpun.

long_definition: destroyed, annihilated, exterminated *MEN--: destroy, eradicate, extinguish. *MEN--KAN: destroy s.t. on s.o's behalf; destroy, exterminate. *PEN--: destroyer. *PEN--AN: annihilation, extermination.
example: Dia ditugaskan MENUMPAS gerombolan kriminal

long_definition: [Jav] spilled all over
example: Barang di lemari itu TUMPLEK keluar

long_definition: *BER- : rest on *MEN- : support, sustain *TER- : concentrated on *-AN : support, pillar, focus, center
example: Arimbi adalah TUMPUAN kasih sayang orang tuanya

definition: small heap. -AN: s.t. that has been piled up.
long_definition: small heap. -AN: s.t. that has been piled up.
vernacular_definition: Timbun; susunan sekelompok barang yang saling tumpang tindih.
example: TUMPUKAN buku-buku ini perlu diseleksi satu-persatu.

long_definition: 1. dull; 2. blunt; 3.obtuse *ME- : 1. become blunt; 2. become stupid
example: Jika engkau malas belajar, pikiranmu akan MENUMPUL

long_definition: cash *ME-KAN: fulfill; carry out *PE-AN: (cash) payment; settlement; fulfillment

definition: BER-(-AN): engaged to be married. Also MEM(PER)--KAN, -AN, PER--AN.
long_definition: ^BER-(-AN): engaged to be married. MEM(PER)--KAN: to engage o.'s child to s.o. else. -AN: fiance. PER--AN: engagement.

long_definition: *BER--: sprout *MEN--I: prune *--HARAPAN: ray of hope, the new generation *MASA --: time of budding
example: Di awal musim semi, pohon-pohon mulai BERTUNAS lagi

long_definition: immoral, indecent.

definition: MEN-(-KAN): postpone. TER-: postponed. PEN--AN: postponement.
long_definition: *MEN-(-KAN): postpone. *TER-: postponed. *PEN--AN: postponement.

example: PENUNDAAN itu memang disengaja supaya semua orang bisa kebagian tempat.

definition: to bend down, bow, submit. MEN-: to bow. Also MEN--KAN.
long_definition: ^*1 be bent down. 2 be bent in submission, submit to a higher authority. *MEN- : to bow *MEN- -KAN: to cause s.o. or s.t. to bow or submit.
example: kerajaan musuhnya DITUNDUKKANNYA.

long_definition: solitary, single one.
example: Biasanya anak TUNGGAL akan menjadi manja sekali.

definition: ride a horse or vehicle. -AN: s.t to ride.
long_definition: ride a horse or vehicle. -AN: s.t. to ride.
example: Kuda TUNGGANGAN ini usianya masih sangat muda.

definition: wait. MEN-: wait for, anticipate. MEN--I: watch over. PEN-: guard, sentry, etc.
long_definition: ^wait. *MEN-: wait for, anticipate. *MEN--I: watch over. *PEN-: guard, sentry, attendent.
example: Katanya pohon besar itu ada PENUNGGUnya.

long_definition: tree stump, stubble
example: TUNGGUL pohon itu sangat kuat

long_definition: leg *MEN-- : kick
example: Dia memukul TUNGKAI meja itu sehingga patah

long_definition: fire hearth, fire place.
vernacular_definition: Alat pemanas; tempat pembakaran; alat yang ada apinya, biasanya untuk memasak.

definition: 1. support. 2. support the development of. -AN: support.
long_definition: 1. support. 2. support the development of. -AN: support.
example: TUNJANGAN hari raya sangat diharapkan oleh para buruh.

definition: index finger; to show s.t. Also MEN-, MEN--KAN, MEMPER--KAN, PEN-, +
long_definition: ^1 index finger. 2 to show s.t. MEN-: 1 point to, indicate, show. 2 designate. 3 raise o.'s hand. MEN--KAN: point s.t. out. *MEMPER--KAN: show, demonstrate, exhibit. PE-: directions, instructions. *PEN-: s.t. which indicates. *PER--AN: exhibition, performance.
example: Jangan kau rubah PENUNJUK jalan ini.

long_definition: exhaustive, complete and thorough.
example: Semua pekerjaan yang dipegangnya selalu selesai dengan TUNTAS.

definition: MEN-: demand, prosecute. -AN: a demand or indictment. Also PEN-.
long_definition: ^*MEN-: demand, prosecute. *-AN: a demand or indictment. *PEN-: s.o. who makes a demand or presses a legal suit.
example: Dia yang akan menjadi PENUNTUT UMUM nanti.

long_definition: *tourist.
vernacular_definition: Orang asing yang sedang berlibur di suatu tempat.
example: Banyak juga TURIS Amerika yang datang ke Indonesia.

long_definition: tourism.

definition: descend, decrease, decline. MEN-: to go down or decrease. Also MEN--KAN, +
long_definition: ^descend, decrease, decline. *MEN-: to go down or decrease. *MEN--KAN: to lower or reduce s.t. *KE--AN: 1 decline, descent. 2 offspring, descendents. -AN: generation, descendent. PEN--AN: descent, reduction.
example: Orang-orang di keluarganya adalah KETURUNAN orang berilmu tinggi.

definition: join in with, go along with. BER-_-_: in succession. Also MEN-, AN.
long_definition: ^join in with, go along with. *BER-_-_: in succession, one after the other. *MEN-: follow, according to, comply with. *-AN: example.
example: Buku pedomannya menjadi TURUTAN orang banyak.

definition: 1. a pin. 2. stick. MEN-: 1. stab s.o. 2. prick. 3. penetrate. Also MEN--I+
long_definition: ^1. a pin. 2. stick. MEN-: 1. stab s.o. 2. prick. 3. penetrate. MEN--I: 1. perforate s.t. in many places. 2. penetrate. MEN--KAN: stab s.o.

definition: closed, covered; lid, cover. BER-: to have a cover. Also MEN-, MEN--I, +
long_definition: ^1 closed, covered. 2 lid, cover. BER-: to have a cover. *MEN-: to close, cover, or hide. *MEN--I: cover up, cover repeatedly. MEN--KAN: cover with s.t. TER-: covered, shut. *PEN-: a cover or lid.
example: Kain PENUTUP rambutnya selalu tersibak angin.

definition: speech, talk, pronounce. BER-: talk or speak. Also MEN--KAN, -AN.
long_definition: speech, talk, pronounce. BER-: talk or speak. MEN--KAN: relate, tell (a story). -AN: 1 story, narrative. 2 pronouncement.
example: Segala TUTURANnya mengandung banyak kebenaran.

long_definition: television.

definition: "Televisi Republik Indonesia," the Indonesian state television service.
long_definition: acronym for "Televisi Republik Indonesia," the Indonesian state television service.

definition: money. KE--AN: FINANCES. PER--AN: monetary matters.
long_definition: money. *KE--AN: finances. *PER--AN: monetary matters.
vernacular_definition: Alat penukar yang terbuat dari kertas atau logam.
example: Masalah PERUANGAN memang dia yang selalu memegang.

definition: steam, vapor, fume. BER-: to steam; be carbonated. Also MENG-, MENG--I, +
long_definition: ^steam, vapor, fume. BER-: 1 to steam. 2 to be carbonated (of soft drinks). MENG-: to vaporize. MENG--I: to steam or vaporize s.t. PENG--AN: evaporation.

example: Proses PENGUAPAN ini menggunakan arang.

long_definition: ^difference. *BER-: to change or become different. *BER-_-_: capricious, always changing, to change continuously. *MENG-: 1 become different. 2 to change or alter s.t. *PER--AN: change, alteration.
example: Tumbuhnya pohon itu tergantung pada PERUBAHAN cuaca.

definition: grey hair. BER-: to have grey hairs.
long_definition: grey hair. BER-: to have grey hairs.
vernacular_definition: Rambut yang berwarna putih, biasanya terdapat pada orang-orang yang telah lanjut usia.
example: Mengapa anak muda itu sudah BERUBAN?

long_definition: ^chase *MENG-(-): to pursue, to chase
example: *Polisi MENGUBER-UBER pencuri itu

long_definition: casava ubi jalar = sweet potatoe
example: UBI diolah sebagai makanan ternak

long_definition: floortile; tile
example: Gempa bumi kemarin telah merusak UBIN rumah kami

definition: saying, word. BER-: say. Also MENG-, WENG--I, MENG-(-KAN), -AN.
long_definition: ^saying, word. BER-: say, utter. MENG-: worshiping God by pronoucing His names and attributes. MENG--I: say s.t. to s.o. MENG-(-KAN): express. -AN: expression, greeting, statement, pronunciation.
MENG-: chase after, pursue.
MENG-: stir.

definition: KE--AN: 1. naughtiness, mischief. 2. reckless ness, inconsiderateness. Also -AN.
long_definition: ^KE--AN: 1. haughtiness, mischief. 2. recklessness, inconsiderateness. -AN: mischievous, reckless.
shrimp, prawn - windu= large shrimp.
example: UDANG WINDU sangat mahal saat ini

definition: air, weather. BER-: have a certain k.o. weather. Also PENG--AN.
long_definition: air, weather. *BER-: have a certain k.o. weather. *PENG--AN: airing (on the radio, television, etc.).
example: PENGUDARAAN siaran radio ini untuk seluruh negeri.

long_definition: MENG-: to stir, to toss (about)
example: Saya MENGUDEK teh dengan gula di gelas

long_definition: (Jv, Jkt) headcloth (for men).

definition: upper reaches of a river; interior regions. MENG-: to head upriver.
long_definition: 1 upper reaches of a river. 2 interior regions. *MENG-: to head upriver.
example: Kita MENGUDIK mengikuti sungai ini dari kota ke gunung.

long_definition: (Unio Democratica Timorense) Timorese Democratic Union.
^MENG-: to smoke (tobacco, opium) PENG-: smoker -AN: pipe
example: Endang menggunakan UDUTAN jika dia merokok

long_definition: intimidation, threat. MENG-: intimidate, threaten.
see HUJAN.

definition: statement, utterance. BER-: to speak. Also MEN--KAN, -AN.
long_definition: statement, utterance. *BER-: to speak. *MENG--KAN: to say s.t., talk about s.t. *-AN: something said or pronounced, a saying.
example: UJARAN yang benar memang patut ditiru.

definition: test, experiment, try out. MENG-: examine, test. TER-: tested. -AN: examination.
long_definition: ^test, experiment, try out. *MENG-: examine, test. *TER-: tested. *-AN: examination.
example: Saya akan menghadapi UJIAN akhir bulan depan.

definition: tip, point, end. BER-: pointed. MENG-: come to a point.
long_definition: ^tip, point, end. *BER-: pointed. *MENG-: come to a point.
example: Selokan ini MENGUJUNG di jalan itu.

definition: capital city of the Province of Southern Sulawesi in Indonesia.
long_definition: capital city of the Province of Southern Sulawesi in Indonesia.

definition: BER-: carved, engraved. MENG-: to carve or engrave. Also TER-, -AN, +
long_definition: ^BER-: carved, engraved. MENG-: to carve or engrave. TER-: carved. -AN: carved object. PENG-: carver or engraver.
vernacular_definition: Hiasan berupa pahatan yang berbentuk suatu gambar atau bentuk-bentuk abstrak.
example: Banyak orang Bali yang menjadi PENGUKIR.

definition: measure, measuring tape. Also SE-, MENG-, -AN, PENG-.
long_definition: measure, measuring tape. *SE-: of the same measurement or level, in agreement. BER--AN: have a measurement of. *MENG-: to measure. *-AN: measurement, size, dimension. *PENG-: device for measuring, a person who measures.
vernacular_definition: Mengetahui panjang/berat sesuatu dengan suatru alat.
example: Alat PENGUKUR ini terbuat dari emas.

long_definition: ^ way of acting, attitude MENG-: to work (on, at)
example: ULAH si Amir sangat menjengkelkan

definition: 1. (Isl.) 1. scholar of Islam . 2. Muslim religious teacher or leader.
long_definition: 1. (Isl.) 1. scholar of Islam. 2. Muslim religious teacher or leader.

definition: repeat. BER-: to happen again, recur, to repeat. Also MENG-, MENG-I, TER-, -AN.
long_definition: repeat. *BER-: to happen again, recur, to repeat. *MENG-: do s.t. over. *MENG--I: do s.t. over and over. *TER-: repeated. *-AN: a rerun, revision.
example: ULANGANku minggu lalu dapat A.

long_definition: snake.

^ 1.envelope, wrapping, cover 2. analyze BER-: envelopped, wrapped *MENG-: 1. to envelope, to cover (chairs), to line (nest), to paint ( walls) 2. to lengthen, to continue, to assist, to analyze -AN: 1. cover, envelope 2. continuation 3. analysis, review, case
example: *Seda MENGULAS buku karangan Pramudya dengan cermat

long_definition: 1. caterpillar; 2. maggot *BER--: worm-eaten
example: Jangan makan buah yang sudah BERULAT itu

long_definition: see ULEK
*MENG--: pulverize, grind *--2: pestle *--AN: pestle; s.t. crushed with a pestle *SAMBAL--: grind chillie sauce
example: Mataku perih dan berair karena MENGULEK cabe dan bawang merah

definition: able and willing to take up challenges.
long_definition: able and willing to take up challenges.
vernacular_definition: Liat dan kuat; tidak mudah menyerah.
example: Karena KEULETANnya bekerja, usahanya menjadi maju.

long_definition: kind of hard wood.
vernacular_definition: Nama sejenis pohon yang kayunya sangat kuat.

long_definition: community.
example: Kerukunan UMAT beragama sangat penting bagi kehidupan bermasyarakat.

long_definition: see UBI

definition: 1. example. 2. like, as. SE-: like, equal, supposing. (SE-)-NYA: for example.+
long_definition: ^1. example. 2. like, as. SE-: 1. like, equal. 2. supposing. (SE-)-NYA: for example. BER-: talk hypothetically. MENG--KAN: 1. compare. 2. take as an example. 3. assume, suppose. PER--AN: parable.

definition: general, common. SE--NYA: generally. Also MENG--KAN, KE--AN, PENG--AN.
long_definition: ^general, common. *SE-NYA: generally, ordinary. *MENG--KAN: announce, proclaim. KE--AN: generality. *PENG--AN: announcement, notification.
example: Apakah kamu sudah membaca PENGUMUMAN yang baru?

definition: age. BER-: have the age of.
long_definition: age. BER-: have the age of.
example: Putraku sekarang BERUMUR delapan tahun.

long_definition: see UNDANG1=(invite . . .) UNDANG2=(law, regulation . . .).
*MENG-: invite. *-AN: invitation.
example: Apakah UNDANGAN untuk pesta ulang tahunku sudah sampai kepada alamatmu?

definition: UNDANG-UNDANG: law, regulation. MENG--KAN: legislate, make into law.
long_definition: *UNDANG-UNDANG: law, regulation. *MENG--KAN: legislate, make into law.
vernacular_definition: Hukum yang ditetapkan oleh suatu badan/organisasi.
example: Pemerintah baru saja MENGUNDANGKAN larangan merokok.

definition: 1. go back, withdraw. 2. be out of circulation or publicity. MENG--KAN: +
long_definition: 1. go back, withdraw. 2. be out of circulation or publicity. MENG--KAN: 1. cause s.t. to go back. 2. postpone. PENG--AN: retreat, withdrawal, postponement.
example: PENGUNDURAN jadwal pertunjukan menyebabkan dia menjadi kecewa

definition: superior, excellent. KE--AN: excellence, superiority. Also -AN.
long_definition: ^superior, excellent. KE--AN: excellence, superiority. -AN: a superior thing or person.
vernacular_definition: Lebih dalam sesuatu hal dibandingkan dengan yang lain; bermutu baik.
